Aqua Hulcus 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Aqua Hulcusアクア・ハルカス 
 Japanese (base):
アクア・ハルカス
 Phonetic:
Akua Harukasu
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Liquid People
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーがバトルゾーンに出たとき、カードを1枚引いてよい。 
Power:
2000
Flavor Texts:
リキッド・ピープルは液体を自在に操る。彼らにとって、水は鎧であり剣である。 Liquid People freely control liquid. For them, water is armor and shield. (DM-01, M9/Y1, T3 Y1) チャンスを物にしろ! それが切り札を引き当てる鍵! "Seize the opportunity! That's the key to drawing your trump card!" —Aqua Hulcus (DMD-02) 「龍素」はドラゴンの中だけでなく、様々なものの中に存在している。それらを抽出するための計算式が、龍程式である。'Dragment' exists not only within dragons but also within various things. The formula used to extract it is known as the Dragon Formula. (DMD-17) ドローして後続を補給して息をもつかせぬ猛攻をみせるっちゃ！さすが殿堂カードだっちゃ! Draw cards, replenish the next wave, and launch an unrelenting assault! As expected of a Hall of Fame card! (DMX-20) S級侵略者を失ったギュウジン丸は最終侵略ウイルスを持って「禁断の世界」へと向かった。しかし、そこにはふたりのドギラゴンがいるのだ! "Having lost its S-Rank Invader, Gyuujinmaru headed toward the 'Forbidden World' carrying the final invasion virus. However, there are two Dogiragons waiting there!" (DMR-20)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Eiji Kaneda
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   23/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  80/110 — Common DMD-02 Start Dash Deck: Water & Darkness   10/15 — Common DMD-17 Beginning Dragon Deck: Crystal Memory Dragon   11/14 — Common DMX-20 Deck Ultimate Perfection!! Due-Max 160 ~Revolution & Invasion~   55/68 — Common DMR-20 Gyuujinmaru's True Identity!!   51/70 — Common DMEX-08 Mysterious Black Box Pack  247/??? — Common Promotional   M9/Y1 — No RarityPromotional   T5 Y1 — Common 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
  W ● EHulcusCreatures
Aqua Hulcus ● Cobalt Hulcus, Aqua Savage ● Hulcus-1, Cyber ● Viblo Blade, Hulcus Range ● Yobinion HulcusSpells
Hulcus Draw, Continuous ChantRelated Creatures
Aqua Vibrato

Aqua Knight 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Aqua Knightアクア・ナイト 
 Japanese (base):
アクア・ナイト
 Phonetic:
Akua Naito
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Liquid People
English Text:
■ When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーが破壊される時、墓地に置くかわりに自分の手札に戻す。 
Power:
4000
Flavor Text:
Like a whirlpool, it never seems to end. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
D-Suzuki  Shin "JASON" Nagasawa
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   24/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  17/110 — Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   27/140 — Rare Promotional   B4/7 Y1 — Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Come Into Play Trigger 
Aqua Sniper 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Aqua Sniperアクア・スナイパー 
 Japanese (base):
アクア・スナイパー
 Phonetic:
Akua Sunaipā
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
8
Race:
Liquid People
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose up to 2 creatures in the battle zone and return them to their owners' hands.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーをバトルゾーンに出した時、バトルゾーンにあるクリーチャーを2体まで選び、持ち主の手札に戻す。 
Power:
5000
Flavor Texts:
Water surrounds, enfolds, buoys... and attacks. (DM-01) あなたは水の中にいる。あなたに水が襲いかかる。You're in water. The water attacks you. (DM-01, DM-18) その射撃の腕は天下無双。ある時には1発の弾丸で2つの標的を打ちとった時もあるという。後の世に言う「一石二鳥」の語源である。His shooting abilities are unparalleled. It is said that at times he hits two targets with one bullet. This was the origin of the saying: "to kill two birds with one stone". (DMX-19)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Seki
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   S3/S10 — Super Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  S3/S10 — Super Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   S4/S10 — Super Rare DMX-19 Super Rare 100% Pack   S16/??? — Super Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Aqua Soldier 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Aqua Soldierアクア・ソルジャー 
 Japanese (base):
アクア・ソルジャー
 Phonetic:
Akua Sorujā
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Liquid People
English Text:
■ When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーが破壊される時、墓地に置くかわりに自分の手札に戻す。 
Power:
1000
Flavor Texts:
"What a spirit for such a skinny little thing." —Brawler Zyler (DM-01) 「もやし野郎のくせに、根性だけはたいしたもんだ。」 "Even though I'm just a bean sprout, I'm gonna get straight to the meat and potatoes." (DM-01, DM-18, DMC-24)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Jason
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   25/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  50/110 — Uncommon DM-18 Best Challenger   62/140 — Uncommon DMC-24 Illusion Blue Half Deck   13/43 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Random Page
in:
Water, Creature, Mana Cost 2, 			
and
5 more
Liquid People 
1000 Power Creatures 
No Abilities 
TCG 
OCG 
Aqua Vehicle 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
This is a Vanilla card.It has no abilities.
Aqua Vehicleアクア・ビークル 
 Japanese (base):
アクア・ビークル
 Phonetic:
Akua Bīkuru
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
2
Race:
Liquid People
Power:
1000
Flavor Texts:
The chip implanted in its head lets the Cyber Lords control its brain waves. (DM-01) ドラゴンのエッセンスを凝縮した素材「龍素」。それを発見したのはリキッド・ピープル閃だった。彼らはそこからクリスタル・コマンド・ドラゴンを生み出し完全に制御することに成功した。 ...かに見えたが、「龍素」にはまだまだ隠された力が眠っているのだ! The material 'Dragon Element' or 'Dragment,' which condenses the power of dragons. It was discovered by the Liquid People Sen. From it, they created the Crystal Command Dragons and succeeded in fully controlling it....or so it seemed, but 'Dragment' still holds hidden powers waiting to be awakened!" (DMD-17)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Atsushi Kawasaki  Toshiaki Takayama
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   26/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  83/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   107/140 — Common DMD-17 Beginning Dragon Deck: Crystal Memory Dragon   12/14 — Common

Power Attacker +2000 
Self Increase Power 
Armored Walker Urherion 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Armored Walker Urherion走神兵ウルヘリオン (Divine Walker Urherion) 
 Japanese (base):
走神兵ウルヘリオン (Divine Walker Urherion)
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Armorloid
English Text:
■ While you have at least 1 Human in the battle zone, this creature gets +2000 power during its attacks.
Japanese Text:
■ バトルゾーンに自分のヒューマノイドがあれば、攻撃中、このクリーチャーのパワーは+2000される。 
Power:
3000+
Flavor Text:
"The world at peace? I'd rather see the world in pieces." (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Tsutomu Kawade
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   67/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  61/110 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:

in:
Fire, Creature, Mana Cost 1, 			
and
5 more
Machine Eater 
2000 Power Creatures 
TCG 
OCG 
Come Into Play Trigger 
Artisan Picora 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Artisan Picora職人ピコラ 
 Japanese (base):
職人ピコラ
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
1
Race:
Machine Eater
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put 1 card from your mana zone into your graveyard.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーがバトルゾーンに出たとき、自分のマナゾーンからカードを1枚選び、自分の墓地に置く。 
Power:
2000
Flavor Text:
「簡単簡単。叩けば直るよ。」"Fix it? That's easy. Just hit it."  -Legendary Artisan Picora (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Akifumi Yamamoto
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   68/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  99/110 — Common 
Other Card Information:

Astrocomet Dragon 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Astrocomet Dragonメテオ・ドラゴン 
 Japanese (base):
メテオ・ドラゴン
 Phonetic:
Meteo Doragon (Meteor Dragon)
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
7
Race:
Armored Dragon
English Text:
■ Power attacker +4000 (While attacking, this creature gets +4000 power.)
​■ Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
Japanese Text:
■ パワーアタッカー+4000（攻撃中、このクリーチャーのパワーは+4000される）
​■ W・ブレイカー(このクリーチャーはシールドを2つブレイクする) 
Power:
6000+
Flavor Texts:
全身の武器ひとつひとつが、国すらも滅ぼす力を秘めている。Even the smallest weapon attached to it has enough firepower to lay waste to an entire nation. (DM-01) 大地に落ちた空は、竜の姿となった。When the sky fell to the earth, it was in the shape of a dragon. (DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Yusaku Nakaaki  ozica
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   S7/S10 — Super Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  S8/S10 — Super Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   S8/S10 — Super Rare 
Other Card Information:

in:
Nature, Spell, Mana Cost 4, 			
and
3 more
TCG 
OCG 
Gives "Power Attacker" 
Aura Blast 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Aura Blastオーラ・ブラスター 
 Japanese (base):
オーラ・ブラスター
 Phonetic:
Ōra Burasutā (Aura Blaster)
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
4
English Text:
■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets "power attacker +2000" until the end of the turn. (While attacking, a creature that has "power attacker +2000" gets +2000 power.)
Japanese Text:
■ このターン、バトルゾーンにある自分のクリーチャーすべてのパワーは攻撃中+2000される。 
Flavor Text:
聞け! 偉大なる大地のとどろきを! Hear the roar of the mighty Earth! (DM-01, DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Nottsuo
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   89/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  40/110 — Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   50/140 — Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Gives "Power Attacker"

in:

and

Ghost

TCG 
OCG

Come Into Play Trigger 
Black Feather, Shadow of Rage 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Black Feather, Shadow of Rage怒りの影ブラック・フェザー 
 Japanese (base):
怒りの影ブラック・フェザー
 Phonetic:
Ikari no Kage Burakku Fezā
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
1
Race:
Ghost
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーが出た時、自分のクリーチャーを1体破壊する。 
Power:
3000
Flavor Text:
オレのこと、弱いと思ってたやつら、許せねぇ! "I can't forgive those who thought I was weak!" —Black Feather, Shadow of Rage (DM22-EX1)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Soushi Hirose
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   45/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  92/110 — Common DM22-EX1 Golden Strategy!! Dueking MAX 2022  超46/超50 — Common 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Bloody Squito 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Bloody Squitoブラッディ・イヤリング 
 Japanese (base):
ブラッディ・イヤリング
 Phonetic:
Buraddi Iyaringu (Bloody Earring)
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
2
Race:
Brain Jacker
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
■ This creature can't attack.
■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy it.
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー（このクリーチャーをタップして、相手クリーチャーの攻撃先をこのクリーチャーに変更してもよい）
■ このクリーチャーは攻撃することができない。
■ このクリーチャーがバトルする時、バトルの後、このクリーチャーを破壊する。 
Power:
4000
Flavor Texts:
闘いに集まり、闇に還る習性を持つ。They gather to fight and return to the darkness. (P66/Y8) 死を求めさまよう、理解を超えた命。Wandering seeking death, life beyond understanding. (P74/Y8) ブロッカーを持っているクリーチャーは、相手のクリーチャーの攻撃に対してかわりにバトルしてくれるぞ! "Creatures that have blocker will battle against your opponent's creature attacks instead!" (SpDeck9)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Atsushi Kawasaki  Hideaki Takamura  HIROHIDE NISHIMURA  hokuyu  KEIGO KIMURA  RYOSUKE NISHIYAMA
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   46/110 — Common Shadowclash Collector Tin  17/46 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  89/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   114/140 — Common DMC-02 Kokujo's Darkness Deck   25/43 — Common DMC-07 Eternal Insects Deck   59/82 — Common DMC-19 Zakira's Dragon Commander Deck   72/102 — Common DMC-58 Mad Rock Chester  15/16 — Common DMD-02 Start Dash Deck: Water & Darkness   14/15 — Common Win and Jashin 40-Card Special Deck  3/11 — Common Promotional   P33/Y7, P34/Y7, P66/Y8, P74/Y8 — Common 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
  W ● EBloodyCreatures
Bloody Cymbal ● Bloody Dragoon ● Bloody Mary ● Bloody Shadow, Mystic Light Death Knight ● Bloody Squito ● Chile, Bloody Believer ● Zamizanin, Blood Treaty MonsterRelated Cards
Drilling Earring ● Jargon, Misfortune Demon 12 / Dark Soul Creation ● Bloodow-2, Rotten Saint

TCG 
OCG 
Bolshack 
Self Increase Power 
Attack Trigger 
Bolshack Dragon 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Bolshack Dragonボルシャック・ドラゴン 
 Japanese (base):
ボルシャック・ドラゴン
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
6
Race:
Armored Dragon
English Text:
■ While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard.
​■ Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
Japanese Text:
■ 攻撃中、このクリーチャーのパワーは、自分の墓地にある火のカード1枚につき+1000される。
​■ W・ブレイカー(このクリーチャーはシールドを2つブレイクする) 
Power:
6000+
Flavor Texts:
The last city that offended it is now a ruin. (DM-01) その怒りに触れたために、ひとつの都市が消滅した. A city was destroyed since it touched his wrath. (DM-01, DMC-01) 心を1つにして信じあったとき、その夢はきっと叶う! When you fuse your hearts as one and believe, your dreams will come true! (DMC-53) 片目のボルシャックを見たら、その姿を魂に刻むと良い。その龍は真に勇敢な龍だから. If you see the one-eyed Bolshack, engrave that figure into your soul. That dragon is a truly courageous dragon. (DM-18, DMC-66) 怒りは力に、悲しみは勇気に変わる。散っていった仲間の魂をそのペン先に込めて、紅き炎で描き上げる!! Rage into power, and sorrow into courage. Engrave the souls of the companions who fallen into the tip of the pen and illustrate the crimson flames!!  (P34/Y6) 失いし片目は歴戦の証、その強さ雷電の如く! The lost eye is the proof of battles, and that strength is like lightning! (P48/Y6) 燃え上がる爆炎は闘士の証。敗れていった友の悲しみを怒りに変える! The rising flames are the proof of a warrior. The sorrows of fallen companions will be changed into rage! (P56/Y6) 日本一を目指す者たちを、彼はいつだって全力で応援する!! He always roots for those who to aim to be the top in Japan! (P50/Y7) デュエルがつないだ俺たちの友情は永遠だろ?　Our friendship connected through duels is eternal, right? (P95/Y9) デュエル・マスターズの歴史はここから始まった。 The history of the Duel Masters began here. (DMEX-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Ryoya Yuki  Ittoku  Shigenobu Matsumoto  MATSUMOTO EITO  HIROAKI KUDOU  KEITA HATTORI  shosuke  Futaro
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   69/110 — Very Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  8/110 — Very Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   11/140 — Very Rare DMC-01 Shobu's Blaze Deck   2/43 — Very Rare DMC-53 Legend Chronicle Shobu  9/20 — Very Rare DMC-66 Duel Masters: Super Best   32/36 — Very Rare DMX-21 Masters Chronicle Pack: Comic of Heroes   3/70 — Very Rare DMX-21 Masters Chronicle Pack: Comic of Heroes   ㊙1/㊙3 — Secret Card ㊙DMX-22 Super Black Box Pack   b71/??? — Very Rare DMEX-01 Duel Masters: Golden Best  1/80 [2002] — Very Rare DMEX-17 20th Anniversary Huge Thanks Memorial Pack: The Chapter of The Ultimacy Dueking MAX  超1/超40 [2002] — Very Rare Promotional   P34/Y6, P48/Y6, P56/Y6, P50/Y7, P95/Y9 — Very Rare 
Other Card Information:

  W ● EBolshack 「ボルシャック」Creatures

Bolshack Balafiol ● Bolshack Force DragonEvolution Creatures

Bone Assassin, the Ripper 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Bone Assassin, the Ripper切り裂く者ボーン・アサシン 
 Japanese (base):
切り裂く者ボーン・アサシン
 Phonetic:
Kiriku Mono Bōn Asashin
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Living Dead
English Text:
■ Slayer (When this creature loses a battle, destroy the other creature.)
Japanese Text:
■ スレイヤー（このクリーチャーがバトルする時、バトルの後、相手クリーチャーを破壊する） 
Power:
2000
Flavor Text:
彼らは最前線に送るべきだ。味方の近くにいると危なくてしょうがないから。 Commanders send them to the front line. It's too dangerous to have them close. (DM-01, DMC-02)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Nottsuo
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   47/110 — Common Shadowclash Collector Tin  18/46 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  88/110 — Common Shadowclash Collector Tin  18/46 — Common DMC-02 Kokujo's Darkness Deck   22/43 — Common 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Creature
Mana Cost 4
Living Dead
2000 Power Creatures
TCG
OCG

Reverse Slayer 
Bone Spider 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Bone Spider捕らえる者ボーン・スパイダー 
 Japanese (base):
捕らえる者ボーン・スパイダー
 Phonetic:
Toraeru Mono Bōn Supaidā (Seizing Bone Spider)
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Living Dead
English Text:
■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy it.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーがバトルする時、バトルの後、このクリーチャーを破壊する。 
Power:
5000
Flavor Text:
彼らは永久にだって待つことができる。死ぬ時はひとりじゃないことを知っているから。They can wait forever, for they know they will not die alone. (DM-01, DMC-04, DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Dai
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   48/110 — Uncommon Shadowclash Collector Tin  19/46 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  56/110 — Uncommon DM-18 Best Challenger   72/140 — Uncommon DMC-04 Kokujo's Darkness Power-Up Pack   15/43 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Categories: 
Darkness
Creature
Mana Cost 3
Living Dead
5000 Power Creatures
TCG
OCG
Reverse Slayer

Brain Serum 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Brain Serumネオ・ブレイン 
 Japanese (base):
ネオ・ブレイン
 Phonetic:
Neo Burein (Neo Brain)
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
4
English Text:
​​ Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.)
■ Draw up to 2 cards.
Japanese Text:
​ S・トリガー（この呪文をシールドゾーンから手札に加える時、コストを支払わずにすぐ唱えてもよい）
■ カードを2枚まで引く。 
Flavor Texts:
知は最も偉大な力なり! Knowledge is the greatest of strengths! (DM-18, DMC-24, DMC-31) 未来を掴みとれ! Take the future into your own hands! (P10/Y3)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Dreamwave  hippo
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   27/110 — Uncommon DM-18 Best Challenger   65/140 — Uncommon DMC-24 Illusion Blue Half Deck   14/43 — Uncommon DMC-31 Great Mecha-O Eraser   10/21 — Uncommon Promotional   A2/Y1, P10/Y3 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
  W ● EBrain 「ブレイン」Spells
"Brain", Cyber Spell ● "Zenbrain", Extreme Wisdom Spell ● Brain Book ● Brain Concerto ● Brain Cyclone ● Brain Re:Charger ● Brain Slash ● Brain Storm ● Brain Touch ● Brain Typhoon ● Brain x Brain ● Brain's Coral Saint Tree ● Cyber Brain ● Eternal Brain ● Eureka Charger ● Extreme Brain ● Future Brain ● History Reciting Brain ● Jester Brain ● Magic Shot - Open Brain ● Onsen Brain ● Original Brain ● Prism Brain ● Pulp Brain ● Quattro Brain ● Super Brain a.k.a. Generation ● Triple Brain ● 「Destructive Red! Scrapper Red!」「Knowledgeable Blue! Brain Blue!」「Enchanting Green! Trap Green!」「Flashy Yellow! Spark Yellow!」「Greedy Purple! Hand Purple!」「We are where the break is! Shield Sentai, Triggerger!!」Twinpacts
Eternal Brain / Brain's Coral Saint Tree ● Franz the 1st, the Ice Fang / Magic Shot - Open Brain ● Gangan Mammoth, Tusk Divine Soldier / Brain Typhoon ● Gosentoras, Angry Red Beard / Brain's Alarming Steel Fangs ● Hurricane Crawler / Brain Charger ● Magic Acogi Semipro / ♪ Quiet, Anyway Brain Cicada Minmin ● Mikuru, Future Faerie / Miracle Brain ● Molgara, Northern Searcher / Triple Brain ● Neonkus, Palace Missionary / Neo Brain ● Tamategame, Palace Ship / Brain Time ● 卍 Gi Lugirin 卍 / Bangoku BrainSupport

Brawler Zyler

											History										
											Talk (0)										
Brawler Zyler喧嘩屋タイラー 
 Japanese (base):
喧嘩屋タイラー
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
2
Race:
Human
English Text:
■ Power attacker +2000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)
Japanese Text:
■ パワーアタッカー+2000（攻撃中、このクリーチャーのパワーは+2000される） 
Power:
1000+
Flavor Text:
「やめときな。怪我するぜ。」 "I wouldn't, if I were you. You don't want to get hurt."  ─Brawler Zyler (DM-01, DM-18, DMC-01, DMS-05)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Tsutomu Kawade
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   70/110 — Common Shadowclash Collector Tin  35/46 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  98/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   125/140 — Common DMC-01 Shobu's Blaze Deck   40/43 — Common DMC-25 Shobu's Fullmetal Fire Deck   42/45 — Common

Come Into Play Trigger 
Bronze-Arm Tribe 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Bronze-Arm Tribe青銅の鎧 
 Japanese (kana):
ブロンズ・アーム・トライブ (Bronze-Arm Tribe)
 Japanese (base):
青銅の鎧
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Beast Folk
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーをバトルゾーンに出した時、自分の山札の上から1枚目をマナゾーンに置く。 
Power:
1000
Flavor Texts:
They're bringing some friends to the party. (DM-01) 彼らが現れたら注意が必要だ。その後ろに龍がいるかもしれないのだから。If they appear, be careful. There might be a dragon behind them. (DMC-39) 真の仲間と呼べる奴を、俺は信じる。I believe in a someone who can be called a true friend. (DMD-01) 自然あるところ青銅の鎧あり。Where there is nature, there is Bronze-Arm Tribe. (DMX-02) その力を借りたことの無い者がいないほどの英雄。He is such a hero that there is no one who has not borrowed his power. (DMX-09) オレ様抜きで、自然文明は語れないぜ! ブラック・ボックス入りも当然だな! "You can't talk about nature civilization without talking about me! No wonder you're in the black box!" ─Bronze-Arm Tribe (DMX-12) Bronze-arm Tribe Smaaaaaaaaaash!!! (DMX-22) オラクル教団の策略により子供の姿となってしまったクロスファイア。だが、レイジ・クリスタルの神秘に触れ、ドロン・ゴーを身につけた。Crossfire was transformed into a child by the Oracle Cult. However, he was touched by the mystery of the Rage Crystal and acquired Doron Go. (DMD-11) マナを増やしすぎて本当にすまないと思っているゥ! "I'm really sorry for adding too much mana!" (DMX-20) マナを増やしてミア・ダママにつなぐぞ! "Let's get more mana and connect to Mia Damama!" ─Bronze-Arm Tribe (DMX-23) マナを増やしまくって有利になれ! "More mana all around, give me the advantage!" (Duema 40 Card Special Deck) Incredible!!! Haaaaahhhhh! Look up!! (DMX-24) コイツでマナを増やせば次のターンは5マナ! カツえもん剣やブリキンジェットで攻撃して、ドギラゴン銀刃に革命チェンジだ! "If you increase your mana with this guy, you'll have five mana next turn! Attack with Katsuemon Buster or Briking Jet, then Revolution Change to Dogiragon Silver!" (DMD-34) 大型クリーチャー満載のグランセクトを使うには、マナを増やすのが必須戦略! "Increasing mana is an essential strategy to use Gransect, which is full of large creatures!" (DMSP-01) 切札勝舞とデュエル・マスターズの出会いが、世界を救い、人々を変えた。Shobu Kirifuda's encounter with Duel Masters saved the world and changed people. (DMEX-01) かつて別々だった2枚のカード。それが、1枚のカードとなった。これこそが新たなるツインパクトの力! Two cards that were once separate, now they have become one card. This is the power of the new Twinpact! (DMEX-04) 暴拳王国はジャオウガに敗れて誇りを失った結果、勝利にしか意義を見出せなくなった。今は鬼札覇王連合の一部として鬼札王国に従いつつも、勝ち続けることで強さを証明し、最後はジャオウガと再び戦って奪われた誇りを取り戻さなければならないと考えている。Bouken Kingdom lost its pride after their defeat by Jaouga, and as a result, it can only find meaning in victory. Now, as part of the Onifuda Overlord Coalition, he follows the Onifuda Kingdom, but believes that he must prove his strength by continuing to win, and finally regain his stolen pride by fighting Jaouga again. (DMEX-13) マナの輝きよ、世界と我が剣に宿れ! "Let the glow of mana dwell in the world and in my blade!" (P49/Y6) 世界をマナで満たすため、彼らは今日も戦い続ける。To fill the world with mana, they continue to fight today (P57/Y6, DMPCD-01) あらゆる戦場を渡り歩き、あらゆる戦を経験してきたのだ。He had been to every battlefield and experienced every battle. (P16/Y8) 世界に名を馳せた勇士の登場は、いつだって戦を加速させる。The appearance of a world-renowned hero always accelerates the war. (P24/Y8) マナを増やしまくって有利になれ! "Ramp up your mana to gain an advantage!" (SpDeck2) 相手よりマナを増やして早く切り札を出すのが自然文明の戦い方!　3ターン目はマナが増やせるカードを使おう! "The natural way of fighting for the Nature civilization is to increase mana faster than the opponent and deploy trump cards early! Let's use cards that increase mana on the third turn!" (SpDeck5) マナの力で、戦いの熱はさらに加速する!" With the power of mana, the heat of battle will accelerate even further!" (P82/Y9) 仲間を呼べ! 彼らは必ずこたえてくれるっ!! "Call your friends! I'm sure they'll respond!" (P90/Y9) 俺はまだまだ先を目指して行きたいんだ! これからも「デュエマ道」を共に進もう! "I still want to go further! Let's keep moving forward together on the 'Duema Road'!"　―Bronze-Arm Tribe (P43/Y10) ウホウホ! ふやしちゃうぞーー!! "Uho Uho! I'll make more!" ─Bronze-Arm Tribe (P77/Y12) デュエマーランド、そこは夢と希望の国!! 楽しかったらまた来てくれよな!! "Duema Land, it's a land of dreams and hopes!! Come back again if you enjoy it!!" (P22/Y14)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Yusaku Nakaaki  Yocky  Daisuke Izuka  Mikio Masuda  Clazroom  HIROAKI KUDOU  KAIRI SHOYAMA  YUUSUKE TAKITA  KEITA HATTORI  RYOSUKE NISHIYAMA  kazutoshi yokota  jintetsu
Sets and Rarity:

Katta Edition  51/56 — Common DMX-12 Black Box Pack   b105/??? — Common DMD-11 Forbidden Transform Deck: The Book of Outrage   c21/21 — Common DMX-20 Deck Ultimate Perfection!! OCG 
Burning Mane 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
This is a Vanilla card.It has no abilities.
Burning Mane炎のたてがみ (Mane of Flame) 
 Japanese (kana):
バーニング・ヘアー (Burning Hair)
 Japanese (base):
炎のたてがみ (Mane of Flame)
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
2
Race:
Beast Folk
Power:
2000
Flavor Texts:
若木を根こそぎに引き抜くと、それが小枝であるかのように振り回した。 It pulled up a young tree by its roots, swinging it over its head as though it were a twig. (DM-01, DMC-22, DMC-61) 彼等の前で自然を汚してはならない。その理由が知りたければ、一度試してみればいい。ただし、やるなら一人の時にやってくれ。 You must not pollute nature in front of them. If you want to know the reason, you should try it once. However, if you do, please do it alone. (DM-18, DMS-05) 1マナや2マナの小型獣を並べて攻撃しまくるのが、このデッキの戦略だ! "The strategy of this deck is to line up small creatures with a mana cost of 1 or 2 and attack relentlessly!" (SpDeck7)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Sansyu  Seki
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   91/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  108/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   138/140 — Common DMC-22 Hell Boost Half Deck   40/43 — Common DMC-61 CoroCoro Dream Pack 4: Eternal Heaven   86/94 — Common Team Kirifuda Super King Deck 40 Card!!  10/11 — Common 
Other Card Information:

in:
Fire, Spell, Mana Cost 1, 			
and
4 more
TCG 
OCG 
Increase Power 
Gives "Power Attacker" 
Burning Power 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Burning Powerバーニング・パワー 
 Japanese (base):
バーニング・パワー
 Phonetic:
Bāningu Pawā
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
1
English Text:
■ One of your creatures gets "power attacker +2000" until the end of the turn. (While attacking, a creature that has "power attacker +2000" gets +2000 power.)
Japanese Text:
■ バトルゾーンにある自分のクリーチャーを1体選ぶ。 このターンの攻撃中、そのクリーチャーのパワーは+2000される。 
Flavor Text:
うずまく炎の力を見ろ! Witness the power of whirling fire! (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Miho Midorikawa
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   71/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  102/110 — Common 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Fire
Spell
Mana Cost 1
TCG
OCG
Increase Power
Gives "Power Attacker"

Cyber Virus

Candy Drop 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Candy Dropキャンディ・ドロップ 
 Japanese (base):
キャンディ・ドロップ
 Phonetic:
Kyandi Doroppu
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Cyber Virus
English Text:
■ This creature can't be blocked.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーはブロックされない。 
Power:
1000
Flavor Texts:
No mouth. Big bite. (DM-01) 逃げるわけないじゃない。だってわたし…、真の決闘者なんですもの。"I'm not running away. Because I… am a true duelist." ─Mimi Tasogare (DMX-21)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Gyokan  Okera
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   28/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  81/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   105/140 — Common DMC-24 Illusion Blue Half Deck   25/43 — Common DMC-42 CoroCoro Dream Pack 3: Eternal Gear   65/90 — Common DMC-61 CoroCoro Dream Pack 4: Eternal Heaven   68/94 — Common DMX-21 Masters Chronicle Pack: Comic of Heroes   56/70 — No Rarity
Other Card Information:

Cyber Virus

Random Page
in:
Fire, Spell, Mana Cost 2, 			
and
3 more
TCG 
OCG 
Can Attack Untapped Creatures 
Chaos Strike 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Chaos Strikeカオス・ストライク 
 Japanese (base):
カオス・ストライク
 Phonetic:
Kaosu Sutoraiku
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
2
English Text:
■ Choose 1 of your opponent's untapped creatures in the battle zone. Your creatures can attack it this turn as though it were tapped.
Japanese Text:
■ バトルゾーンにある相手のクリーチャーを1体選ぶ。 このターン、選んだクリーチャーがタップされていなくても攻撃できる。 
Flavor Texts:
"You won't escape me!" (DM-01) お前は、このオレが必ず倒す! "I will definitely defeat you!" (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Soushi Hirose
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   72/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  34/110 — Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
			Categories			 
Categories: 
Fire
Spell
Mana Cost 2
TCG
OCG
Can Attack Untapped Creatures

Chilias, the Oracle 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Chilias, the Oracle予言者キリアス 
 Japanese (base):
予言者キリアス
 Phonetic:
Yogensha Kiriasu
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Light Bringer
English Text:
■ When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your hand instead.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーがバトルゾーンから自分の墓地に置かれるとき、墓地に置くかわりに自分の手札に戻す。 
Power:
2500
Flavor Text:
天空に輝く塔は、たちを守るためだけに存在する。The shining towers in the sky exist to protect the oracles. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Akira Hamada
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   1/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  14/110 — Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Coiling Vines 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Coiling Vinesからみカズラ 
 Japanese (base):
からみカズラ
 Phonetic:
Karamikazura
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Tree Folk
English Text:
■ When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーがバトルゾーンから自分の墓地に置かれるとき、墓地に置くかわりに自分のマナゾーンに置く。 
Power:
3000
Flavor Texts:
They eat vegetarians. (DM-01) デュエマクイズ Lv.3 Duel Masters  Quiz Lv.3  デュエル・マスターズ第1弾の発売日は!? What is the release date of the first Duel Masters set!?  答え：2002年5月30日 Answer: May 30, 2002 (DMEX-08)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
D-Suzuki
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   92/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  67/110 — Uncommon DMEX-08 Mysterious Black Box Pack  239/??? — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:

TCG 
OCG 
Gives "Slayer" 
Creeping Plague 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Creeping Plagueブラック・スレイヤー 
 Japanese (base):
ブラック・スレイヤー
 Phonetic:
Burakku Sureiyā (Black Slayer)
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
1
English Text:
■ Whenever any of your creatures becomes blocked this turn, it gets "slayer" until the end of the turn. (When a creature that has "slayer" loses a battle, destroy the other creature.)
Japanese Text:
■ このターン、自分のクリーチャーをブロックした相手クリーチャーはすべて、バトルに勝っても持ち主の墓地に置かれる。 
Flavor Texts:
Witness the power of the Dark! (DM-01) これが闇の戦士たちの力だ! "This is the power of the soldiers of Darkness!" (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Ryoya Yuki
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   49/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  28/110 — Rare 
Other Card Information:

TCG 
OCG 
Power Based Removal 
Crimson Hammer 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Crimson Hammerクリムゾン・ハンマー 
 Japanese (base):
クリムゾン・ハンマー
 Phonetic:
Kurimuzon Janmā
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
2
English Text:
■ Destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.
Japanese Text:
■ バトルゾーンにある、パワー2000以下の相手のクリーチャーを1体選び、持ち主の墓地に置く。 
Flavor Texts:
There's nothing a Machine Eater enjoys more than a good game of Whack-a-Hulcus. (DM-01) 油断は死を意味する…。 Overconfidence means death... (DM-01, DMC-01, DMC-23, DMC-42)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Daisuke Izuka
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   73/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  101/110 — Common DMC-01 Shobu's Blaze Deck   43/43 — Common DMC-23 Speed Burn Half Deck   37/43 — Common DMC-42 CoroCoro Dream Pack 3: Eternal Gear   83/90 — Common 
Other Card Information:

Random Page
in:
Shield Trigger, Water, Spell, 			
and
4 more
Mana Cost 4 
TCG 
OCG 
Deck Search 
Crystal Memory 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Crystal Memoryクリスタル・メモリー 
 Japanese (base):
クリスタル・メモリー
 Phonetic:
Kurisutaru Memorī
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
4
English Text:
​​ Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.)
■ Search your deck. You may take a card from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
Japanese Text:
​ S・トリガー (この呪文をシールドゾーンから手札に加える時、コストを支払わずにすぐ唱えてもよい)
■ 自分の山札を見る。 その中からカードを1枚選び、自分の手札に加える。 その後、山札をシャッフルする。 
Flavor Texts:
自由自在に選べば、攻めも守りも100点満点! To be able to choose freely, perfect for offense and defense! (DMX-14) 記憶は儚く、脆いもの。だが、その積み重ねが人生となる。Memory is an ephemeral, fragile thing. However, the stacking of them becomes life. (DMD-24) 切り札と、その使い手の思い出は、いつまでも光り輝いている。The trump card and the memories of the user are shining all the time. (DMEX-01) たまにクリーチャー世界に現われる3人組。ウサギ団と名乗る彼らが探すのは、遺跡でも財宝でもなく……レアカード。Sometimes, a trio appears in the creature world. Calling themselves Team Usagi, what they seek is not ruins or treasure, but... rare cards. (DMEX-02)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Ryoya Yuki  hatapug  MATSUMOTO EIGHT
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   29/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  22/110 — Rare DMC-61 CoroCoro Dream Pack 4: Eternal Heaven   19/94 — Rare DMX-14 The Greatest Strategies Perfect 12  52/84 — Rare DMD-24 Masters Chronicle Deck: Bolmeteus Returns   19/37 — Rare DMEX-01 Duel Masters: Golden Best  4/80 [2002] — Rare DMEX-02 Duema Quest Pack ~The Top 12 Legendary Strategies~   81/84 — Rare Promotional   P42/Y15 — Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Spell

in:
Blocker, Darkness, Creature, 			
and
6 more
Mana Cost 4 
Brain Jacker 
6000 Power Creatures 
TCG 
OCG 
Reverse Slayer 
Dark Clown 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Dark Clownダーク・クラウン 
 Japanese (base):
ダーク・クラウン
 Phonetic:
Dāku Kuraun
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Brain Jacker
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
■ This creature can't attack.
■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy it.
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー（このクリーチャーをタップして、相手クリーチャーの攻撃先をこのクリーチャーに変更してもよい）
■ このクリーチャーは攻撃することができない。
■ このクリーチャーがバトルする時、バトルの後、このクリーチャーを破壊する。 
Power:
6000
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Jason
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   50/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  26/110 — Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   32/140 — Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Creature
Mana Cost 4
Brain Jacker
6000 Power Creatures
TCG
OCG
Reverse Slayer

Dark Raven, Shadow of Grief 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Dark Raven, Shadow of Grief嘆きの影ダーク・レイブン 
 Japanese (base):
嘆きの影ダーク・レイブン
 Phonetic:
Nageki no Kage Dāku Reibun
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Ghost
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー(相手クリーチャーが攻撃する時、このクリーチャーをタップして、その攻撃を阻止してもよい。その後、その相手クリーチャーとバトルする) 
Power:
1000
Flavor Text:
闇の中には何か隠れている気がするものだ。それは正しい。If you've ever thought there was something hiding in the dark, you were right. (DM-01, M11/Y1)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Norikatsu Miyoshi
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   51/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  55/110 — Uncommon Promotional   M11/Y1 — No RarityPromotional   K3/Y1 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Creature
Mana Cost 4
Ghost
1000 Power Creatures
TCG
OCG

in:

and
4 more
Mana Cost 2

OCG 
Creature Recovery 
Dark Reversal 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Dark Reversalダーク・リバース 
 Japanese (base):
ダーク・リバース
 Phonetic:
Dāku Ribāsu (Dark Reverse)
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
2
English Text:
​​ Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.)
■ Return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.
Japanese Text:
​ S・トリガー (この呪文をシールドゾーンから手札に加える時、コストを支払わずにすぐ唱えてもよい)
■ クリーチャーを1体、自分の墓地から手札に戻す。 
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Nottsuo
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   52/110 — Uncommon Shadowclash Collector Tin  21/46 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  58/110 — Uncommon DM-18 Best Challenger   74/140 — Uncommon DMC-02 Kokujo's Darkness Deck   16/43 — Uncommon

in:
Fire, Creature, Mana Cost 1, 			
and
5 more
Dragonoid

TCG 
OCG 
Attacks Each Turn If Able 
Deadly Fighter Braid Claw 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Deadly Fighter Braid Claw凶戦士ブレイズ・クロー (Berserker Blaze Claw) 
 Japanese (base):
凶戦士ブレイズ・クロー (Berserker Blaze Claw)
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
1
Race:
Dragonoid
English Text:
■ This creature attacks each turn if able.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーは、可能であれば毎ターン攻撃する。 
Power:
1000
Flavor Texts:
A Dragonoid's true home is the battlefield. (DM-01) 一番乗りはこの俺だ! "I'm the first one!" —Deadly Fighter Braid Claw (DMC-55) 勝利の秘訣は速さ! 速さ! "The secret to victory is speed! Speed!" (DMD-01) 誰よりも先に攻撃するのだ! "Attack before anyone else does!" (DMD-21) 一番槍、俺がイタダキ! "I'll take the first strike!" —Deadly Fighter Braid Claw (DMX-14) 1ターン目はオレを呼び出せ! "Summon me on the first turn!"  —Deadly Fighter Braid Claw (SpDeck) 1ターン目はオレを出して最速革命チェンジだ! "On the first turn, summon me and perform the fastest Revolution Change!" (SpDeck2) バッキャロー! 小さくたって、最速はオレだ! "Bakkyarou! Even if I'm small, I'm still the fastest!" —Deadly Fighter Braid Claw (DMX-24) 1ターン目から、3、2、1、ゴーシュート! "From the first turn, 3, 2, 1, Go Shoot!" ―Valt Aoi (SpDeck3) まずはコイツからスタート! "Let's start with this one!" (DMEX-02) 1ターン目に手札にあれば迷わずこいつ!  序盤から相手のシールドをブレイクしていくのが勝利の近道だ! "If you have it in your hand on the first turn, go for this one without hesitation! Breaking the opponent's shields from the early game is the shortcut to victory!" (SpDeck6) 「かわいいフリー素材集　いらすとや」さんのイラストだけど、僕はフリー素材ではないワン!!」 "Even though it's an illustration from 'Cute Free Material Collection - Irasutoya,' I'm not just free material!" ―Deadly Fighter Braid Claw (DMEX-08) 1ターン目はやっぱりコイツ! 序盤から攻めまくって、キリフダッシュを決めろ!! "Of course it's this one on the first turn! Attack relentlessly from the early game and finish with Kirifudash!" (DMSD-14) 1ターン目にコイツを出せたらラッキー! どんどん攻撃して勝利を目指そう!! "It's lucky to summon this one on the first turn! Let's keep attacking and aim for victory!!" (SpDeck7) 白凰率いる白い騎士団四天衆、「速攻の三国」。火文明を使った速攻においては、勝舞すらしのぐ使い手である! The 'Speedy Trio' of the White Knights, led by Hakuoh, excels in swift attacks. Among those who utilize the Fire Civilization for rapid assaults, they surpass even Shobu! (DMEX-15) 1ターン目に出すならこいつ! "If you're going to play something on the first turn, it's gotta be this one!" (Gum1) 終末魔導大戦。5文明の最後の戦いは、興奮と共に、そう呼ばれることになる。"The Final Magical War". The last battle of the five civilizations is destined to be called that, accompanied by excitement. (P38/Y4) さあ戦おう!  お前のこと、もっともっと知りたいからな! "Let's battle! Because I want to know more and more about you!"　—Deadly Fighter Braid Claw (P103/Y16) 勝舞の前からさったザキラを始めとするガルドたちは南極にて力を蓄える。だが、原初の決闘者、アダムによってすでに乗っ取られていたXによってAを除くガルドはザキラもろとも全滅させられてしまう……勝舞、最後の戦いがここから始まる。　—勝舞とガルドの闘いの歴史 その10 "Before the battle with Shobu, GARDE, including Zakira who was killed earlier, gathers power in Antarctica. However, except for Ash, GARDE, already taken over by the primal duelist Adam, is completely annihilated by X, leaving Zakira behind... Shobu, the final battle begins here." —History of the battles between Shobu and GARDE, Part 10 (DMBD-16) 1ターン目にブレイズ・クロー召喚! これこそが攻めの王道だ!! "Summoning Blaze Claw on the first turn! This is the true path of aggression!" (DM24-SD1) 壱百満天原サロメが空白のカードを手にした瞬間、勇壮な面構えのドラゴンが現れたのだった。The moment Hyakumantenbara Salome took hold of the blank card, a dragon with a gallant visage appeared before her. (DM24-EX4)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Yusaku Nakaaki  Masaki Hirooka  moi  森多ヒロ  吉崎観音  みふねたかし  ShoPro  KISUKE  okizi
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   74/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  100/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   128/140 — Common DMC-01 Shobu's Blaze Deck   41/43 — Common DMC-06 Dragon Strikes Deck   72/82 — Common DMC-23 Speed Burn Half Deck   35/43 — Common DMC-32 Mars Flash   22/27 — Common DMC-42 CoroCoro Dream Pack 3: Eternal Gear   82/90 — Common DMC-55 CoroCoro Legend 7   79/84 — Common DMC-61 CoroCoro Dream Pack 4: Eternal Heaven   82/94 — Common DMD-01 Start Dash Deck: Fire & Nature   8/13 — Common DMX-14 The Greatest Strategies Perfect 12  34/84 — Common DMD-21 Due-ma Start Deck: Invincible Fire Civilization   12/12 — Common CoroCoro Dogiragon 40 Card Deck  12/13 — Common Duema 40 Card Special Deck  7/13 — Common DMX-24 Shine! Duedemy Prize Pack   47/54 — Common CoroCoro Special Deck  13/14 — Common DMRP-06 Strike Back Galaxy 卍・Inferno・Annihilation!!   G3/G5 — Common DMEX-02 Duema Quest Pack ~The Top 12 Legendary Strategies~   56/84 — Common Duema Gacharange Explosive Speed Start 52 Card Deck Set  11/15 — Common DMEX-08 Mysterious Black Box Pack  2/??? — Common DMSD-14 King Master Start Deck: Joe's Kirifudash   13/15 — Common Team Kirifuda Super King Deck 40 Card!!  6/11 — Common DMEX-15 20th Anniversary Huge Thanks Memorial Pack: The Chapter of The Souls The BEST of Great Scenes  95/100 — Common Special King Deck: Joe's Fire Civilization  10/10 — Common DMBD-16 20th Chronicle Deck: Battle Now!! Bolshack Duel  敵10/敵10 — Common DM24-SD1 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Attack   12/12 — Common DM24-EX4 Nijisanji Collaboration Pack: Virtual Duelist  94/100 — Common Promotional   P38/Y4, P103/Y16 — Common

Untapped Removal 
Death Smoke 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Death Smokeデス・スモーク 
 Japanese (base):
デス・スモーク
 Phonetic:
Desu Sumōku
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
4
English Text:
■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures.
Japanese Text:
■ 相手のタップされていないクリーチャーを1体破壊する。 
Flavor Texts:
Savor the taste of fear! (DM-01) "Life is like this joke. It's very, very funny, and now it's over." -Trixo, Wicked Doll (DM-06) "Tune in next week for more of the exciting adventures of Quixotic Hero Swine Snou-Oh, Never mind." (DM-10) 真の恐怖を味わうがいい! "Experience true fear!" (DM-01, DMC-02, DMC-22) もはや逃れる術は無い。There is no longer any way to escape. (DM-06, DMC-07, DMC-08) ぱっくりもぐもぐ。Chomp chomp. (DM-10, DMC-14, DMC-19) 止まったら駄目だってばさ。You can't stop, you know. (DM-18, DMC-28, DMC-42) 火の煙は高い所に、死の煙は命のある所に。The smoke of fire rises to high places, while the smoke of death lingers where life exists. (DMC-38)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Dustmoss  Yarunoca  Ittoku  Toshiaki Takayama
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   53/110 — Common Shadowclash Collector Tin  22/46 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  93/110 — Common DM-06 Stomp-A-Trons of Invincible Wrath   53/110 — Common DM-06 Invincible Soul   94/110 — Common DM-10 Shockwaves of the Shattered Rainbow   46/110 — Common DM-10 Eternal Arms   93/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   118/140 — Common DMC-02 Kokujo's Darkness Deck   30/43 — Common DMC-07 Eternal Insects Deck   61/82 — Common DMC-08 Endless Black Hole Deck   61/82 — Common DMC-14 Crimson Armorloids Deck   63/78 — Common DMC-19 Zakira's Dragon Commander Deck   76/102 — Common DMC-22 Hell Boost Half Deck   31/43 — Common DMC-28 Grand Devil Finisher   18/19 — Common DMC-38 Castle of Demon   30/33 — Common DMC-42 CoroCoro Dream Pack 3: Eternal Gear   73/90 — Common DMC-44 Endless All Delete   36/37 — Common 
Other Card Information:

											History										
											Talk (0)										
Deathblade Beetleデスブレード・ビートル 
 Japanese (base):
デスブレード・ビートル
 Phonetic:
Desuburēdo Bītoru
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Giant Insect
English Text:
■ Power attacker +4000 (While attacking, this creature gets +4000 power.)
​■ Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
Japanese Text:
■ パワーアタッカー+4000（攻撃中、このクリーチャーのパワーは+4000される）
​■ W・ブレイカー(このクリーチャーはシールドを2つブレイクする) 
Power:
3000+
Flavor Texts:
やつは全てを食い荒らす。It devours all. (DM-01) フィオナの森は、何度焼かれても蘇る、生命をはぐくむ森。デスブレード・ビートルはそこでも特に力強い生命の象徴とされていた。 The Fiona Woods regenerates no matter how many times it has been burnt. It is the forest of life. Deathblade Beetle is one of the symbols of its powerful life. (DMX-19)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Dustmoss  Kou1
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   S9/S10 — Super Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  S10/S10 — Super Rare DMX-19 Super Rare 100% Pack   S47/??? — Super Rare 
Other Card Information:

  W ● EDeathbladeCreatures
Deathblade Beetle ● Deathblade Orion, Sutured Forest Seaking ● Deathmatch Beetle

in:

Demon Command

Deathliger, Lion of Chaos 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Deathliger, Lion of Chaos混沌の獅子デスライガー 
 Japanese (base):
混沌の獅子デスライガー
 Phonetic:
Konton no Shishi Desuraigā
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
7
Race:
Demon Command
English Text:
​■ Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
Japanese Text:
​■ W・ブレイカー(このクリーチャーはシールドを2つブレイクする) 
Power:
9000
Flavor Texts:
The world is deafened by the roar of the deathliger. (DM-01) 「最初の悪魔」が一柱は、かつて、悪魔神とともに、戦場におもむいた。その姿は、まさに混沌を体現したかのように禍々しくも神々しかった。 The "First Demon" once went to the battlefield with the Lord of Demons. This embodiment of chaos was considered disastrous or godly. (DMX-19)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Atsushi Kawasaki  Nottsuo
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   S5/S10 — Super Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  S5/S10 — Super Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   S6/S10 — Super Rare DMX-19 Super Rare 100% Pack   S24/??? — Super Rare

Dia Nork, Moonlight Guardian 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Dia Nork, Moonlight Guardian月光の守護者ディア・ノーク 
 Japanese (base):
月光の守護者ディア・ノーク
 Phonetic:
Gekkō no Shūgosha Dia Nōku
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Guardian
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
■ This creature can't attack players.
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー（このクリーチャーをタップして、相手クリーチャーの攻撃先をこのクリーチャーに変更してもよい）
■ このクリーチャーは、相手プレイヤーを攻撃できない。 
Power:
5000
Flavor Text:
たちに出会った種族には、空を飛ぶことは最大のタブーとなる。Flying is the greatest taboo of any race that has encountered the Guardians. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Tomofumi Ogasawara
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   2/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  13/110 — Rare 
Other Card Information:

Deck Search 
Dimension Gate 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Dimension Gateディメンジョン・ゲート 
 Japanese (base):
ディメンジョン・ゲート
 Phonetic:
Dimenjon Gēto
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
3
English Text:
​​ Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.)
■ Search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
Japanese Text:
​ S・トリガー (この呪文をシールドゾーンから手札に加える時、コストを支払わずにすぐ唱えてもよい)
■ 自分の山札を見る。その中からクリーチャーを1体選んで相手に見せ、自分の手札に加えてもよい。その後、山札をシャッフルする. 
Flavor Texts:
求めよ、然らば与えられん。Ask, and it shall be given. (DMX-02) ガイアハザード、全員集結! Gaiahazard, everyone, assemble! (DMEX-03) ミロクの気まぐれでテレポート装置を譲り受けたアセビ。最初にたどり着いた土地は、サファイア・バンキッシュの住む戦略と芸術の世界「ゲイマ」だった。Due to Miroku's whim, Asebi received a teleportation device. The first land they arrived at was "Geima", a world of strategy and art, where Sapphire Vanquish resided. (DM24-BD5)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Jason  Shishizaru  ZENTOYO  Kou1
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   93/110 — Common Shadowclash Collector Tin  41/46 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  110/110 — Common DM-06 Invincible Soul   109/110 — Common DM-06 Stomp-A-Trons of Invincible Wrath   96/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   140/140 — Common DMC-06 Dragon Strikes Deck   81/82 — Common DMC-15 Eternal Dragons Deck   76/78 — Common DMC-20 Shobu's Holy Dragon Power-Up Pack   100/102 — Common DMC-61 CoroCoro Dream Pack 4: Eternal Heaven   89/94 — Common DMX-02 Deck Builder DX: Hunter Edition   38/42 — Common DMEX-03 Peri!!! Specialness Overloaded Mystery Pack   69/69 — Common DM24-BD5 Exciting Duepa Deck: Asebi and Faeries in Another World  58/60 — Common 
Other Card Information:

Dome Shell 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Dome Shellシェル・ドーム 
 Japanese (base):
シェル・ドーム
 Phonetic:
Sheru Dōmu (Shell Dome)
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Colony Beetle
English Text:
■ Power attacker +2000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)
Japanese Text:
■ パワーアタッカー+2000（攻撃中、このクリーチャーのパワーは+2000される） 
Power:
3000+
Flavor Text:
コロニー・ビートルは世界樹を食い荒らして、自分の背中に巨大な巣を作り上げる。Colony Beetles feed on the World Tree to build gigantic nests on their backs. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Hisashi Momose
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   94/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  68/110 — Uncommon DMC-07 Eternal Insects Deck   38/82 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:

Attacks Each Turn If Able 
Draglide 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Draglideドラグライド 
 Japanese (base):
ドラグライド
 Phonetic:
Doraguraido
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Armored Wyvern
English Text:
■ This creature attacks each turn if able.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーは、毎ターン攻撃しなければならない。 
Power:
5000
Flavor Text:
ドラグライドはワイバーンとともに成長する。そのきずなが彼らの武器である。Draglides grow with their mounts. Their bond is their weapon. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Ittoku
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   75/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  30/110 — Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   40/140 — Rare Promotional   P2/Y0 — Rare 
Other Card Information:

in:
Blocker, Light, Creature, 			
and
5 more
Mana Cost 2

TCG

Emerald Grass 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Emerald Grass碧玉草 
 Japanese (base):
碧玉草
 Phonetic:
Emerarudo Gurasu (Emerald Grass)
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
2
Race:
Starlight Tree
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
■ This creature can't attack players.
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー（このクリーチャーをタップして、相手クリーチャーの攻撃先をこのクリーチャーに変更してもよい）
■ このクリーチャーは、相手プレイヤーを攻撃できない。 
Power:
3000
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Daisuke Izuka
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   3/110 — Common Shadowclash Collector Tin  4/46 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  74/110 — Common 
Other Card Information:

in:

7 more

Come Into Play Trigger 
Explosive Fighter Ucarn 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Explosive Fighter Ucarn爆勇士ユーカーン 
 Japanese (base):
爆勇士ユーカーン
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Dragonoid
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put 2 cards from your mana zone into your graveyard.
​■ Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーをバトルゾーンに出した時、カードを2枚、自分のマナゾーンから墓地に置く。
​■ W・ブレイカー(このクリーチャーはシールドを2つブレイクする) 
Power:
9000
Flavor Texts:
ラゴノイドの戦士は退却しない。勇者はドラゴンに転生できると信じているからである。Dragonoid fighters never retreat. They believe a heroic fighter will become a Dragon in his next life. (DM-01, DMC-06 + P8/Y1) 赤き鎧は、ドラゴンの末裔に相応しい事を証明して見せた者の証なのだ。 Crimson armor is a testimony to those who proved worthy of their dragon ancestors. (DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Hisanobu Kometani  Nakagawa
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   76/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  29/110 — Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   39/140 — Rare DMC-06 Dragon Strikes Deck   14/82 — Rare Promotional   E1/Y1, E3/Y1, L6/6 Y1, K4/Y1, P8/Y1 — Rare 
Other Card Information:

Faerie Child 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Faerie Childフェアリー・チャイルド 
 Japanese (base):
フェアリー・チャイルド
 Phonetic:
Fearī Chairudo
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Cyber Virus
English Text:
■ This creature can't be blocked.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーはブロックされない。 
Power:
2000
Flavor Text:
小さな小さな光の群れ。その全てを防ぐことは不可能だ。 A school of teeny, tiny points of light. Stopping them all is impossible. (DM-01, DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Hisanobu Kometani
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   30/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  49/110 — Uncommon DM-18 Best Challenger   61/140 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:

Fatal Attacker Horvath 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Fatal Attacker Horvath一撃必殺のホーバス 
 Japanese (base):
一撃必殺のホーバス
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Human
English Text:
■ While you have at least 1 Armorloid in the battle zone, this creature gets +2000 power during its attacks.
Japanese Text:
■ バトルゾーンに自分のアーマロイドがあれば、攻撃中、このクリーチャーのパワーは+2000される。 
Power:
2000+
Flavor Texts:
"Any final words?" (DM-01) 「なにか言い残すことはあるか?」 "Do you have anything left to say?" ─Final Attack Horvath (DM-01, DMC-14 + P2/Y1)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Dai
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   77/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  96/110 — Common DMC-14 Crimson Armorloids Deck   68/78 — Common Promotional   P2/Y1 — Common

Fear Fang 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
This is a Vanilla card.It has no abilities.
Fear Fang白銀の牙 (Fang of Silver) 
 Japanese (kana):
シルバー・ファング (Silver Fang)
 Japanese (base):
白銀の牙 (Fang of Silver)
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Beast Folk
Power:
3000
Flavor Text:
世界樹がもたらす超重力に耐えるために、ビーストフォークたちはおどろくべき筋力をそなえている。The Beast Folk are gifted with huge muscles to withstand the tremendous gravity of the World Tree. (DM-01, DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Norikatsu Miyoshi
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   95/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  103/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   133/140 — Common 
Other Card Information:

Fire Sweeper Burning Hellion 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Fire Sweeper Burning Hellion掃討兵バーニング・ヘル (Burning Hell, the Sweeper Soldier) 
 Japanese (base):
掃討兵バーニング・ヘル (Burning Hell, the Sweeper Soldier)
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Dragonoid
English Text:
■ Power attacker +2000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)
Japanese Text:
■ パワーアタッカー+2000（攻撃中、このクリーチャーのパワーは+2000される） 
Power:
3000+
Flavor Text:
最も遅くまで前線に残る者が、最も多く敵を倒すことができる。Those who leave the battle last are the ones who savor victory the longest. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Sansyu
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   78/110 — Common Shadowclash Collector Tin  37/46 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  95/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   121/140 — Common DMC-01 Shobu's Blaze Deck   33/43 — Common Promotional   E2 Y1 — Common 
Other Card Information:

in:
Nature, Creature, Mana Cost 4, 			
and
5 more
Giant Insect 
4000 Power Creatures 
No Abilities 
TCG 
OCG 
Forest Hornet 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
This is a Vanilla card.It has no abilities.
Forest Hornetフォレスト・ホーネット 
 Japanese (base):
フォレスト・ホーネット
 Phonetic:
Foresuto Hōnetto
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Giant Insect
Power:
4000
Flavor Text:
撃で打ち倒す毒針。骨ごと噛み砕くあご。ホーン・ビーストが見ただけですくみあがるのは無理もない。With its deadly sting and crushing jaws, it makes the Horned Beasts cower. (DM-01, DMC-07)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Youichi Kai
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   96/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  66/110 — Uncommon DMC-07 Eternal Insects Deck   37/82 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:

in:

TCG 
OCG 
Creature Untap 
Frei, Vizier of Air 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Frei, Vizier of Air大気の使徒フレイ 
 Japanese (base):
大気の使徒フレイ
 Phonetic:
Taiki no Shito Furei (Frei, Apostle of Air)
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Initiate
English Text:
■ At the end of each of your turns, you may untap this creature.
Japanese Text:
■ 自分のターンの終わりに、このクリーチャーをアンタップしてもよい。 
Power:
3000
Flavor Text:
大気の使徒よ、覚醒せよ。 汝の指は聖なる剣なり。"Vizier of Air, arise. Your fingers are sacred swords." —Hanusa, Radiance Elemental (DM-01, DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Yusaku Nakaaki
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   4/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  43/110 — Uncommon DM-18 Best Challenger   54/140 — Uncommon DMC-17 Dark Warriors Deck   20/78 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Light
Creature
Mana Cost 4
Initiate
3000 Power Creatures
TCG
OCG
Creature Untap

											History

Gatling Skyterrorガトリング・ワイバーン (Gatling Wyvern) 
 Japanese (base):
ガトリング・ワイバーン (Gatling Wyvern)
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
7
Race:
Armored Wyvern
English Text:
■ This creature can attack untapped creatures.
​■ Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーは、タップされていないクリーチャーを攻撃できる。
​■ W・ブレイカー(このクリーチャーはシールドを2つブレイクする) 
Power:
7000
Flavor Text:
Part chopper, part chomper. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Hisashi Momose  D-Suzuki
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   79/110 — Very Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  7/110 — Very Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   10/140 — Very Rare

Card Discard 
Ghost Touch 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Ghost Touchゴースト・タッチ 
 Japanese (base):
ゴースト・タッチ
 Phonetic:
Gōsuto Tatchi
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
2
English Text:
​​ Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.)
■ Your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.
Japanese Text:
​ S・トリガー (この呪文をシールドゾーンから手札に加える時、コストを支払わずにすぐ唱えてもよい)
■ 相手の手札を1枚見ないで選び、捨てさせる。 
Flavor Texts:
取り引きをしよう。Let's make a deal. (DMX-03) タッチ! タッチ! そこにタッチ! "Touch! Touch! Touch there!" (DMX-14) 闇の国と光の国の間にある『壁の雪山』はふたつの国の平和を守っていた。復讐の侵略者は悪霊の力でこれを破壊しようと考えた。The "Snowy Mountain Wall" between the Darkness country and Light country kept them at peace. The Invaders of Revenge thought of destroying it with the power of evil spirits. (DMR-17) 悪魔との接触は、一瞬でも精神を崩壊させる。Even a mere moment of contact with the devil would crush your spirit. (DMR-21) うらめしやー!"I cannot believe it!" ─Katta Kirifuda (DMX-25) うぎゃー! で、出たー! 何が起こったホワット!!  "Ugyaaa! It's, it's appeared! Just what is happening!" ─Dragon Ryu (P5/Y11) さあ、鬼タイムの幕明けだ! "Now, the dawn of Onitime begins!" ─Abaku Onifuda (P77/Y19)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Soushi Hirose  Tonbi Aburaya  Shigenobu Matsumoto  YASUYUKI NODA
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   54/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  94/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   120/140 — Common DMC-02 Kokujo's Darkness Deck   32/43 — Common DMC-08 Endless Black Hole Deck   62/82 — Common DMC-61 CoroCoro Dream Pack 4: Eternal Heaven   77/94 — Common DMX-03 Deck Builder DX: Alien Edition   38/42 — Common DMX-14 The Greatest Strategies Perfect 12  49/84 — Common DMR-17 Burning Dogiragon!!   79/94 — Common DMR-21 Team Hamukatsu and Dogiragon Buster   73/94 — Common DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~   49/51 — Common Duel Masters Card Gummy 3  P77/Y19 — Common Promotional   P5/Y11 — Common 
Other Card Information:

George Barbstein / Ghost Touch

Random Page
in:
Double Breaker, Darkness, Creature, 			
and
7 more
Mana Cost 5 
Chimera 
8000 Power Creatures 
TCG 
OCG 
Self Removal 
Come Into Play Trigger 
Gigaberos 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Gigaberosギガベロス 
 Japanese (base):
ギガベロス
 Phonetic:
Gigaberosu
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Chimera
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy 2 of your creatures or destroy this creature.
​■ Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーがバトルゾーンに出たとき、バトルゾーンにある自分の他のクリーチャー2体を自分の墓地に置く。そうしなければ、このクリーチャーを自分の墓地に置く。
​■ W・ブレイカー(このクリーチャーはシールドを2つブレイクする) 
Power:
8000
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Katsuya
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   55/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  24/110 — Rare DMC-02 Kokujo's Darkness Deck   4/43 — Rare Promotional   L4/6 Y1, WINNER/Y1, P1/Y0 — Rare 
Other Card Information:

											History										
											Talk (0)										
Gigagieleギガジール 
 Japanese (base):
ギガジール
 Phonetic:
Gigajīru
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Chimera
English Text:
■ Slayer (When this creature loses a battle, destroy the other creature.)
Japanese Text:
■ スレイヤー（このクリーチャーとバトルした相手クリーチャーは、勝っても持ち主の墓地に置かれる。） 
Power:
3000
Flavor Text:
ダークロードは、魔獣をつなぎあわせて、生きた悪夢を作り上げた。 By assembling parts of different magical beasts, the Dark Lords created a nightmare. (DM-01 + P03/＊)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Hisashi Momose
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   56/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  25/110 — Rare Promotional   P03/＊ — Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Slayer
Darkness
Creature
Mana Cost 5
Chimera
3000 Power Creatures
TCG
OCG

Come Into Play Trigger 
Gigargon 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Gigargonギガルゴン 
 Japanese (base):
ギガルゴン
 Phonetic:
Gigarugon
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
8
Race:
Chimera
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return up to 2 creatures from your graveyard to your hand.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーをバトルゾーンに出した時、クリーチャーを2体まで、自分の墓地から手札に戻す。 
Power:
3000
Flavor Text:
闇の領域では、死後の安息すら許されない。There is no rest in the Dark Realm, even after death. (DM-01, DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Tsutomu Kawade
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   57/110 — Very Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  6/110 — Very Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   7/140 — Very Rare DMC-02 Kokujo's Darkness Deck   1/43 — Very Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
			Categories			 
Categories: 
Darkness
Creature
Mana Cost 8
Chimera
3000 Power Creatures
TCG
OCG
Creature Recovery
Come Into Play Trigger

Golden Wing Striker

											History										
											Talk (0)										
Golden Wing Striker黄金の翼 (Wing of Gold) 
 Japanese (kana):
ゴールデン・ウィング (Golden Wing)
 Japanese (base):
黄金の翼 (Wing of Gold)
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Beast Folk
English Text:
■ Power attacker +2000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)
Japanese Text:
■ パワーアタッカー+2000（攻撃中、このクリーチャーのパワーは+2000される） 
Power:
2000+
Flavor Text:
Hawk warriors hunt faster than the wind. 魔族の戦士は、木の葉を揺らす風よりも速く狩りをする。 (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Miho Midorikawa
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   97/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  104/110 — Common

in:

and
5 more

Guardian

TCG 
OCG 
Gran Gure, Space Guardian 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Gran Gure, Space Guardian天空の守護者グラン・ギューレ 
 Japanese (base):
天空の守護者グラン・ギューレ
 Phonetic:
Tenkū no Shugosha Guran Gyūre
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
6
Race:
Guardian
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
■ This creature can't attack players.
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー（このクリーチャーをタップして、相手クリーチャーの攻撃先をこのクリーチャーに変更してもよい）
■ このクリーチャーは、相手プレイヤーを攻撃できない。 
Power:
9000
Flavor Texts:
天空の城を汚す者は災いである。彼らは守護者の怒りを知るだろう。Those who defile the Sky Castle are doomed, for they shall know the wrath of the Guardians. (DM-01) 空を覆う巨大な影、それはどれほど巨大だっかことか、ほとんどの者が気が付かなかった。The massive shadow that covered the sky was so immense that most people didn't even notice it. (DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
D-Suzuki  Kou1
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   5/110 — Very Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  1/110 — Very Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   2/140 — Very Rare 
Other Card Information:

Random Page
in:
Double Breaker, Light, Creature, 			
and
5 more
Mana Cost 7 
Angel Command 
9500 Power Creatures 
TCG 
OCG 
Hanusa, Radiance Elemental 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Hanusa, Radiance Elemental光輪の精霊シャウナ 
 Japanese (base):
光輪の精霊シャウナ
 Phonetic:
Kōrin no Seirei Shauna (Shauna, Spirit of Radiance)
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
7
Race:
Angel Command
English Text:
​■ Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
Japanese Text:
​■ W・ブレイカー(このクリーチャーはシールドを2つブレイクする) 
Power:
9500
Flavor Texts:
The sky was scorched by Dragons' fire, and the earth gouged by elementals' rays. The battle raged for seven nights and seven days. ドラゴンの炎が天を焼き、精霊の光線が大地をえぐった。その戦いは七日七晩のあいだ続いた。The fire of the Dragons burnt the heavens, and the rays of the Spirits gouged the earth. The fight lasted seven nights. (DM-01) 世界の始まりの時から二度と見れないと思っていた「聖なる光」が、ここに蘇る。その光は、ふたたび七日七晩にわたる戦いを導くのか、それとも龍の支配を終わらせるのか...。The "Holy Light" from the beginning of the world, thought never to be seen for a second time, revives in this moment. Will this light once again lead this battle to rage on for seven days and seven nights, or will it end the reign of the Dragons... (DMX-19)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Masaki Hirooka
Sets and Rarity:

Creature Tapper 
Holy Spark 
Spark 
Holy Awe 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
This card is included in the Spark name category.
Holy Aweホーリー・スパーク 
 Japanese (base):
ホーリー・スパーク
 Phonetic:
Hōrī Supāku (Holy Spark)
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
6
English Text:
​​ Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.)
■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.
Japanese Text:
​ S・トリガー(この呪文をシールドゾーンから手札に加える時、コストを支払わずにすぐ唱えてもよい) 
■ バトルゾーンにある相手のクリーチャーすべてをタップする。 
Flavor Texts:
溢れ出す光が、全てを白く、天国のように塗りつぶした。 The overflowing light filled all, painting everything as white as the heavens.  (DMC-37, DMPCD-01) 聖霊王。その御身が放つまばゆい光は、悪しき者の妨害を許さない。 -『アルカディアス・バイブル』第1章 第5節 "Lord of Spirits. The dazzling light emanating from his body doesn't allow interference from evil ones."  -'Alcadeias Bible' Chapter 1, Verse 5 (DMX-21) "Today's special is the lightning platter with a side dish of fried you." —Fu Reil, Seeker of Storms (K1/Y1)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Naoki Saito
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   6/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  15/110 — Rare DMC-05 Lightning Thunder Deck   5/82 — Rare DMC-16 Guardian Blue Deck   8/78 — Rare DMC-37 Violence Angel   11/26 — Rare DMX-21 Masters Chronicle Pack: Comic of Heroes   35/70 — Rare DMPCD-01 DueMa Play's CollaboDeck: The Rise of Überdragon & The Rise of Heavenly Gate  天7/16 — Rare Promotional   T3 Y1, K1/Y1 — Rare 
Other Card Information:

Arcadia Spark ● Counterattacking Silent Spark ● Demon Spark ● Dragon Fantasy Trap Spark ● Rainbow Spark ● Scrapper Spiral Spark ● Spark Charger ● 「Destructive Red! Scrapper Red!」「Knowledgeable Blue! Brain Blue!」「Enchanting Green! Trap Green!」「Flashy Yellow! Spark Yellow!」「Greedy Purple! Hand Purple!」「We are where the break is! Shield Sentai, Triggerger!!」Twinpacts

Hunter Fish

											History										
											Talk (0)										
Hunter Fish狩猟魚 
 Japanese (base):
狩猟魚
 Phonetic:
Hantā Fisshu
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
2
Race:
Fish
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
■ This creature can't attack.
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー(相手クリーチャーが攻撃する時、このクリーチャーをタップして、その攻撃を阻止してもよい。その後、その相手クリーチャーとバトルする)
■ このクリーチャーは攻撃することができない。 
Power:
3000
Flavor Text:
サンゴ礁のすきまに隠れていて、餌が近づくと猛然と襲いかかる。It lies in wait, hidden in coral reefs, lashing out ferociously when it senses prey. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Masateru Ikeda
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   31/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  82/110 — Common 
Other Card Information:

Iere, Vizier of Bullets 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
This is a Vanilla card.It has no abilities.
Iere, Vizier of Bullets弾丸の使徒イーレ 
 Japanese (base):
弾丸の使徒イーレ
 Phonetic:
Dangan no Shito Īre (Iere, Apostle of Bullets)
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Initiate
Power:
3000
Flavor Text:
弾丸の使徒よ、 覚醒せよ。 汝の意思は必中の矢なり。 "Vizier of Bullets, arise. Your will is an arrow that never misses the target." —Hanusa, Radiance Elemental (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Daisuke Izuka
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   7/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  72/110 — Common DMC-26 Hakuoh's Angel Kingdom Deck   29/45 — Common Promotional   P06/＊ — Common

in:
Water, Creature, Mana Cost 5, 			
and
6 more
Gel Fish

TCG 
OCG 
Card Draw 
Come Into Play Trigger 
Illusionary Merfolk 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Illusionary Merfolkミラージュ・マーメイド 
 Japanese (base):
ミラージュ・マーメイド
 Phonetic:
Mirāju Māmeido (Mirage Mermaid)
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Gel Fish
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have a Cyber Lord in the battle zone, draw up to 3 cards.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーがバトルゾーンに出たとき、バトルゾーンに自分のサイバーロードがあれば、カードを3枚引いてよい。 
Power:
4000
Flavor Texts:
The Cyber Lords' devotion to beauty is so extreme, they even designed their warrior race to have a pleasant appearance. (DM-01) サイバーロードは、戦闘用の種族を作る時にも美しい外見にこだわった。 (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Kou1
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   32/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  47/110 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Gel Fish

Immortal Baron, Vorg 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
This is a Vanilla card.It has no abilities.
Immortal Baron, Vorg不死身男爵ボーグ 
 Japanese (base):
不死身男爵ボーグ
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
2
Race:
Human
Power:
2000
Flavor Texts:
「わかるか。相手よりでかい武器を持ってるやつが勝つんだよ。」 "You see? The one who wins is the one who has the bigger weapon."  —Immortal Baron, Vorg (DM-01, DMC-01) 「何でも話せる相棒に出会えたことを心から感謝しているさ。」 "I'm truly grateful to have met a partner with whom I can talk about anything." —Mini Titan Gett (DM-18, DMS-05) 遥かな年月を経て、あの伝説の男が帰ってきたぁぁぁぁ! "After countless years, that legendary man has returned!" —炎舌実況ミラクル・ショー (DM-33) 毎ターン 、 クリーチャーを出し続けるのが、勝利への近道! "The shortcut to victory is to keep producing creatures every turn!" —Immortal Baron, Vorg (SpDeck) あ゛～～～～～ -ゾンビーくん&不死身男爵ボーグ "Aaaahhhhhh!" -Zombie-kun and Immortal Baron, Vorg! (SpDeck3) ガンガン攻撃して「鬼タイム」でパワーアップしたクリーチャーの力で敵を蹴散らす! それがこのデッキの戦略だ!! "Relentlessly attack and scatter enemies with the power of creatures powered up by 'Onitime'! That's the strategy of this deck!" (SpDeck8) クリーチャーで相手のシールドをすべてブレイクしてダイレクトアタック! これがデュエマのキホン! とにかくクリーチャーをならべまくれ! "Break all your opponent's shields with creatures and go for a direct attack! That's the basics of Duel Masters! Just keep lining up creatures!" (Gum1)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Dustmoss  Toshiaki Takayama  koji nishino  ながとしやすなり
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   80/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  97/110 — Common DMC-01 Shobu's Blaze Deck   36/43 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   124/140 — Common DM-33 Rising Dragon   51/55 — Common CoroCoro Dogiragon 40 Card Deck  11/13 — Common CoroCoro Special Deck  12/14 — Common Welcome! Onifuda Kingdom Deck 40 Card!!  10/11 — Common Special King Deck: Joe's Fire Civilization  8/10 — Common 
Other Card Information:

Iocant, the Oracle 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Iocant, the Oracle予言者カティノ 
 Japanese (base):
予言者カティノ
 Phonetic:
Yogensha Katino (Catino, the Prophet)
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
2
Race:
Light Bringer
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
■ While you have at least 1 Angel Command in the battle zone, this creature gets +2000 power.
■ This creature can't attack players.
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー（このクリーチャーをタップして、相手クリーチャーの攻撃先をこのクリーチャーに変更してもよい）
■ このクリーチャーは、相手プレイヤーを攻撃できない。
■ バトルゾーンに自分のエンジェル・コマンドがある間、このクリーチャーのパワーは+2000される。 
Power:
2000+
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Naoki Saito
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   8/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  45/110 — Uncommon DMC-26 Hakuoh's Angel Kingdom Deck   15/45 — Uncommon DMX-12 Black Box Pack   b87/??? — Rare DMEX-08 Mysterious Black Box Pack  28/??? — Rare 
Other Card Information:

King Coral 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
King Coralキング・クラーケン 
 Japanese (base):
キング・クラーケン
 Phonetic:
Kingu Kurāken (King Kraken)
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Leviathan
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー（このクリーチャーをタップして、相手クリーチャーの攻撃先をこのクリーチャーに変更してもよい） 
Power:
1000
Flavor Text:
リヴァイアサンは長い長い時間をかけて成長し、やがて世界で最も大きな生物となる。Leviathans mature slowly, eventually growing to become the largest creatures in the world. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Hideaki Takamura
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   33/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  51/110 — Uncommon DM-18 Best Challenger   63/140 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:

King Depthcon 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
King Depthconキング・オリオン 
 Japanese (base):
キング・オリオン
 Phonetic:
Kingu Orion (King Orion)
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
7
Race:
Leviathan
English Text:
​■ Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
■ This creature can't be blocked.
Japanese Text:
​■ W・ブレイカー(このクリーチャーはシールドを2つブレイクする) 
■ このクリーチャーはブロックされない。 
Power:
6000
Flavor Text:
リヴァイアサンは嵐と同じである。通り過ぎるのを待つしかない。Leviathans are just like storms. All you can do is wait until they pass. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Ryoya Yuki
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   S4/S10 — Super Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  S4/S10 — Super Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Creature
Mana Cost 7
Leviathan
6000 Power Creatures
TCG
OCG

King Ripped-Hide 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
King Ripped-Hideキング・ポセイドン 
 Japanese (base):
キング・ポセイドン
 Phonetic:
Kingu Poseidon (King Poseidon)
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
7
Race:
Leviathan
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw up to 2 cards.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーをバトルゾーンに出した時、カードを2枚引いてもよい。 
Power:
5000
Flavor Texts:
はるか昔、サイバーロードは彼の背中に都市を築いた。 Long ago, the Cyber Lords built a city on his back. (DM-01) その巨大な姿は海の偉大さを体現しているかのようだ。 Its huge body embodies the greatness of the sea. (DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Miho Midorikawa  Koji Harada
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   34/110 — Very Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  3/110 — Very Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   4/140 — Very Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

La Ura Giga, Sky Guardian 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
La Ura Giga, Sky Guardian蒼天の守護者ラ・ウラ・ギガ 
 Japanese (base):
蒼天の守護者ラ・ウラ・ギガ
 Phonetic:
Sōten no Shugosha Ra Ura Giga
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
1
Race:
Guardian
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
■ This creature can't attack players.
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー（このクリーチャーをタップして、相手クリーチャーの攻撃先をこのクリーチャーに変更してもよい）
■ このクリーチャーは、相手プレイヤーを攻撃できない。 
Power:
2000
Flavor Texts:
To protect their floating cities, Guardians are gifted with shining wings.  (DM-01) 守護者たちは輝く翼を授けられた。 天空の都市を守るためである。These aircraft, ideal for mass production and versatility, are manufactured on end. (DM-01) 量産性と汎用性に優れた機体は、時代を超えて製造される。These machines with excellent mass production capability and versatility are manufactured across eras. (DMC-61) 戦いの基本はまず守りを固めることにあり。The fundamental of battle is to solidify defense first. (P31/Y7) 蒼天の守護者はいつかより大きな守護者となる。Blue Sky Guardians will someday become bigger Guardians. (P32/Y7)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Kou1  Patricia  HIROYUKI TADOKORO
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   9/110 — Common Shadowclash Collector Tin  7/46 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  76/110 — Common DM-28 Battle Galaxy   76/110 — Common DMC-16 Guardian Blue Deck   48/78 — Common DMC-42 CoroCoro Dream Pack 3: Eternal Gear   62/90 — Common DMC-61 CoroCoro Dream Pack 4: Eternal Heaven   64/94 — Common Promotional   B1/7 Y1, P27/Y5, P31/Y7, P32/Y7 — Common 
Other Card Information:

Lah, Purification Enforcer 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
This is a Vanilla card.It has no abilities.
Lah, Purification Enforcer粛清の伝道師ラー 
 Japanese (base):
粛清の伝道師ラー
 Phonetic:
Shukusei no Dendōshi Rā
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Berserker
Power:
5500
Flavor Text:
伝道師を見た者たちは、日食は災害の前ぶれだと信じるようになった。 Those who have seen this Enforcer believe that eclipses are omens of disaster. (DM-01, DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Hideaki Takamura
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   10/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  12/110 — Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   18/140 — Rare

in:
Light, Spell, Mana Cost 5, 			
and
3 more
TCG 
OCG 
Gives "Unblockable" 
Laser Wing 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Laser Wingレーザー・ウイング 
 Japanese (base):
レーザー・ウイング
 Phonetic:
Rēzā Uingu
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
5
English Text:
■ Choose up to 2 of your creatures in the battle zone. They can't be blocked this turn.
Japanese Text:
■ バトルゾーンにある自分のクリーチャーを2体まで選ぶ。 このターン、そのクリーチャーはブロックされない。 
Flavor Texts:
これが、光の速さだ。 This is light speed. (DM-01) 輝く光翼が、超高速の動きを可能とした。 On shining wings of light, you can move at super-fast speeds. (DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Gyokan  Okera
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   11/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  16/110 — Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   21/140 — Rare 
Other Card Information:

OCG 
Lok, Vizier of Hunting 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
This is a Vanilla card.It has no abilities.
Lok, Vizier of Hunting追跡の使徒ローク 
 Japanese (base):
追跡の使徒ローク
 Phonetic:
Tsuiseki no Shito Rōku (Lok, Apostle of Hunting)
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Initiate
Power:
4000
Flavor Text:
追跡の使徒よ、覚醒せよ。 汝の言葉は光の槍なり。 "Vizier of Hunting, arise. Your words are arrows of light." —Hanusa, Radiance Elemental (DM-01, DM-18 + P04/＊)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Hisanobu Kometani
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   12/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  42/110 — Uncommon DM-18 Best Challenger   53/140 — Uncommon Promotional   P04/＊ — Uncommon

Random Page
in:
Fire, Spell, Mana Cost 3, 			
and
4 more
TCG 
OCG 
Gives "Power Attacker" 
Gives "Double Breaker" 
Magma Gazer 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Magma Gazerマグマ・ゲイザー 
 Japanese (base):
マグマ・ゲイザー
 Phonetic:
Maguma Geizā
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
3
English Text:
■ One of your creatures gets "power attacker +4000" and "double breaker" until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "power attacker +4000" and "double breaker" gets +4000 power while attacking and breaks 2 shields.)
Japanese Text:
■ このターンの終わりまで、バトルゾーンにある自分のクリーチャー1体は、「パワーアタッカー+4000」と「W・ブレイカー」を得る。（攻撃中、そのクリーチャーのパワーは+4000され、シールドを攻撃したとき、シールドを2枚ブレイクする。）　 
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Masaki Hirooka  ittoku
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   81/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  33/110 — Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   43/140 — Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
			Categories			 
Categories: 
Fire
Spell
Mana Cost 3
TCG
OCG
Gives "Power Attacker"
Gives "Double Breaker"
