TCG 
OCG 
Marine Flower 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Marine Flowerマリン・フラワー 
 Japanese (base):
マリン・フラワー
 Phonetic:
Marin Furawā
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
1
Race:
Cyber Virus
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
■ This creature can't attack.
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー(相手クリーチャーが攻撃する時、このクリーチャーをタップして、その攻撃を阻止してもよい。その後、その相手クリーチャーとバトルする)
■ このクリーチャーは攻撃することができない 
Power:
2000
Flavor Texts:
It blooms in the ocean depths, far from any light. (DM-01) 光の届かぬ深海でひっそりと花開く。It blooms quietly in the deep sea where light cannot reach. (DM-04, DMC-27) とにかく時間を稼ぐんだ! "Just buy us some time!" -Marinomancer (DMC-55) 深海に咲く花、マリン・フラワー。その花言葉は、いつでも心に革命を。The flower that blooms in the deep sea, the Marine Flower. Its flower language is "Always have revolution in your heart". (DMR-17) チーム零のキングマスター、ゲンムエンペラーは無限の闇に包まれた宇宙の果てから生まれた無限の龍であり、弱き者を飲み込む「夢幻の無」を操る。Team Zero's King Master, Genmu Emperor, is an infinite dragon born from the edge of the universe, surrounded by infinite darkness, and controls the "Daydream Dark Matter" that swallows the weak. (DMEX-13)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Hikaru Ikusa
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   35/110 — Common DM-04 Challenge of Black Shadow   43/55 — Common DMC-24 Illusion Blue Half Deck   27/43 — Common DMC-27 CoroCoro Dream Pack   42/55 — Common DMC-55 CoroCoro Legend 7   74/84 — Common DMR-17 Burning Dogiragon!!   70/94 — Common DMEX-13 The Great 4 Rising → Powerful Link Pack   58/84 — Common 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Come Into Play Trigger 
Masked Horror, Shadow of Scorn 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Masked Horror, Shadow of Scorn嘲りの影マスクド・ホラー 
 Japanese (base):
嘲りの影マスクド・ホラー
 Phonetic:
Azakeri no Kage Masukudo Horā
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Ghost
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーがバトルゾーンに出たとき、相手の手札からカードを1枚見ないで選び、相手はそれを持ち主の墓地に置く。 
Power:
1000
Flavor Texts:
Seeking to live forever, they left their bodies behind. (DM-01) 彼らは肉体を捨て、永遠の命を求めた。そして、生きる喜びを失った。They abandoned their bodies in search of eternal life. And in doing so, they lost the joy of living. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Gyokan
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   58/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  54/110 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:

TCG

Power Based Removal 
Come Into Play Trigger 
Meteosaur 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Meteosaurメテオザウルス 
 Japanese (base):
メテオザウルス
 Phonetic:
Meteozaurusu (Meteosaurus)
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Rock Beast
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーをバトルゾーンに出した時、バトルゾーンにある相手のパワー2000以下のクリーチャーを1体破壊してもよい。 
Power:
2000
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Masateru Ikeda
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   82/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  60/110 — Uncommon DMC-03 Shobu's Blaze Power-Up Pack   18/43 — Uncommon DMC-23 Speed Burn Half Deck   18/43 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Creature Tapper 
Come Into Play Trigger 
Miele, Vizier of Lightning 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Miele, Vizier of Lightning雷光の使徒ミール 
 Japanese (base):
雷光の使徒ミール
 Phonetic:
Raikō no Shito Mīru
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Initiate
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーをバトルゾーンに出した時、バトルゾーンにある相手のクリーチャーを1体選び、タップしてもよい。 
Power:
1000
Flavor Texts:
雷光の使徒よ、覚醒せよ。汝の目は審判の弓なり。"Vizier of Lightning, arise. Your eyes are a bow of judgment."  —Hanusa, Radiance Elemental (DM-01, DMC-61) 雷光の使徒よ、我等が敵を迎撃せよ。闇を切り裂く刃の如く。 The Apostle of lighting intercepts the enemy as a blade cutting through the darkness. (DM-18, DMC-42) 雷光が屈強な敵をもひるませる。 Lightning makes for a strong enemy. (DMX-10) 超回転による電光は100万ボルト! 光の使徒よ、敵をしびれさせろ! Super-circulating lightning generates a million volts! Apostle of Lightning, numb the enemy! (P12/Y8) 雷光の使徒よ、電光まといて覚醒し、敵をまどわす罠となれ。 The messenger of lightning, awakened by the very same, become a stumbling block to the enemy. (P20/Y8) ミールからあふれるまぶしい光で、相手はタジタジだ!  Dazzling lightning overflows, overwhelming the opponent! (P73/Y12)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Dai  KAIRI SHOYAMA  RYOSUKE NISHIYAMA  YUSUKE TAKITA
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   13/110 — Common Shadowclash Collector Tin  8/46 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  73/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   94/140 — Common DMC-42 CoroCoro Dream Pack 3: Eternal Gear   60/90 — Common DMC-61 CoroCoro Dream Pack 4: Eternal Heaven   62/94 — Common DMX-10 Deck Builder Oni DX Bright Star! Leo Edition  41/56 — Common Promotional   P12/Y8, P20/Y8, P73/Y12 — Common 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
  W ● EMieleCreatures
Miele, Vizier of Lightning ● Miele Thunder, the Gemwing ● Miele, Capturing Silver Moon ● Regomiele, PrimachineSpell
Miele Spark

Mighty Shouter 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Mighty Shouter無敵の咆哮 (Roar of Invincible) 
 Japanese (kana):
マイティ・シャウター (Mighty Shouter)
 Japanese (base):
無敵の咆哮 (Roar of Invincible)
 Phonetic:
Maiti Shautā
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Beast Folk
English Text:
■ When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーが破壊される時、墓地に置くかわりに自分のマナゾーンに置く。 
Power:
2000
Flavor Texts:
"I am not pink!" (DM-01) "See? I told you I'm not pink!" (M15/Y1) His tusks are shattered. His rage is intact. (P6/Y0)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Dustmoss
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   98/110 — Common Shadowclash Collector Tin  43/46 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  105/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   135/140 — Common DMC-22 Hell Boost Half Deck   38/43 — Common Promotional   M15/Y1 — No RarityPromotional   P6 Y0 — Common 
Other Card Information:

Moonlight Flash

											History										
											Talk (0)										
Moonlight Flashムーンライト・フラッシュ 
 Japanese (base):
ムーンライト・フラッシュ
 Phonetic:
Mūnraito Furasshu
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
4
English Text:
■ Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them.
Japanese Text:
■ バトルゾーンにある相手のクリーチャーを2体まで選び、タップする。 
Flavor Texts:
Cower before the purity of the Angel Commands! (DM-01) 少しだまっていてくれないか? Could you all quiet down a bit? (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Hisanobu Kometani
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   14/110 — Uncommon Shadowclash Collector Tin  11/46 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  46/110 — Uncommon

in:
Shield Trigger, Nature, Spell, 			
and
6 more

OCG 
Fixed Removal 
Mana Feed 
Trap 
Natural Snare 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
This card is included in the Trap name category.
Natural Snareナチュラル・トラップ 
 Japanese (base):
ナチュラル・トラップ
 Phonetic:
Nachuraru Torappu (Natural Trap)
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
6
English Text:
​​ Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.)
■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.
Japanese Text:
​ S・トリガー (この呪文をシールドゾーンから手札に加える時、コストを支払わずにすぐ唱えてもよい)
■ バトルゾーンにある相手のクリーチャーを1体選び、持ち主のマナゾーンに置く。 
Flavor Texts:
絡まり伸びるツタがやっと動きを止めると、そこには新たな丘ができていた。When the tangled and extending ivy finally ceased its movement, a new hill had formed there. (DMC-33) 罠にはまった者たちは、夜の森で生きる屍と化す。 Those who get ensnared turn into the Forest of the Night's living dead. (DMC-59, DMC-61, DMX-02, DMPCD-03) 大地が生み出す罠にかかった者は、大地に還る、それがサダメ…。Those caught in the traps created by the earth shall return to the earth; that is fate... (DMD-01) ぶっちゃけ, 土に還るんだな。"Bucchake, they're returning to the earth, huh." (DMD-03) この罠、使わない理由は、ないわな。"There's no reason not to use this trap, right?" (DMX-09, DMPCD-01) 支配を好み、支配されることを嫌うドラゴンにとって、この争いは当然の成り行きだった。For a dragon who favors domination and detests being dominated, this conflict was a natural progression. (DMD-07) 大地の力にも、罠が潜んでいる。Even in the power of the earth, traps lurk. (DMD-13) シールド・トリガーはデッキに8枚以上！そうすれば、シールド5枚から1枚はトリガーが出る! かも!! "8 or more shield triggers in your deck! If you do that, one out of five shields will trigger! Maybe!!" (DMX-20) こんな罠があるなんて、驚き桃の木サプライズ! "To find such a trap is as surprising as stumbling upon a peach tree in full bloom!" -Dragon Ryu (DMX-25) 相手が攻撃してきてもS・トリガーがあれば安心。デッキに入れれば防御力アップだ! "Even if your opponent attacks, you can rest assured with the Shield Trigger. Add it to your deck to increase your defense!" (DMSD-08) 相手のクリーチャーに攻撃されても諦めるな! S・トリガーが発動すれば逆転のチャンスだ!! "Don't give up even if your opponent's creature attacks! When the Shield Trigger occurs, it's a chance for a comeback!!" (DMSD-12) S・トリガーで大逆転! 相手の切札はコレで倒せ！A big turnaround with Shield Trigger! Defeat your opponent's trump card with this! (SpDeck2) S・トリガー発動で逆転チャンス! 相手の切り札をマナに送っちゃえ! Use the Shield Trigger and get a chance to turn things around! Send your opponent's trump card to mana! (SpDeck5) なぜこんなとこに!? ホワーイ!!! "Why are you here!? Why!!!" —Dragon Ryu (P47/Y10)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Sansyu  Miho Midorikawa  Daisuke Izuka
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   99/110 — Rare Shadowclash Collector Tin  44/46 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  40/110 — Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   50/140 — Rare DMC-33 Edge of Dragon   10/27 — Rare DMC-42 CoroCoro Dream Pack 3: Eternal Gear   37/90 — Rare DMC-45 Battle of Yamato Soul   32/35 — Rare DMC-47 Heroes Cross Pack - Shobu   19/44 — Rare DMC-49 Force of Dragon   23/30 — Rare DMC-59 Samurai Ambitious   8/12 — Rare DMC-61 CoroCoro Dream Pack 4: Eternal Heaven   32/94 — Rare DMD-01 Start Dash Deck: Fire & Nature   6/13 — Rare DMX-02 Deck Builder DX: Hunter Edition   17/42 — Rare DMX-09 Deck Builder Oni DX Go For It! Katta Edition  29/56 — Rare DMD-07 Transform Deck Set DX Oni Dragon  15/24 — Rare DMD-13 Super Deck MAX: Katsuking and Legendary Secret Treasure  18/22 — Rare DMX-16 The Great Royal Strategies: Fantasista 12   84/84 — Rare DMX-20 Deck Ultimate Perfection!! Due-Max 160 ~Revolution & Invasion~   35/68 — Rare Duema 40 Card Special Deck  4/13 — Rare DMD-34 Deluxe DueGacha Deck: Hero of the Silver Blade Dogiragon   11/13 — Rare DMX-25 Final Memorial Pack ~E1, E2, E3 edition~   35/51 — Rare CoroCoro Jokers and Nature Double Deck  4/10 — Rare DMSD-08 Super GR Start Deck: Joe's GachaMecha Wonderfoo  13/20 — Rare DMSD-12 Super GR Start Deck: Zero's Orega Moonless Sin   10/19 — Rare DMPCD-01 DueMa Play's CollaboDeck: The Rise of Überdragon & The Rise of Heavenly Gate  竜13/17 — Rare DMPCD-03 DueMaPlay's Collaboration Deck: The Fierce Dragon Hero and the Original Wicked Eye  激10/激17 — Rare Promotional   P48/Y10 — Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
  W ● ETrap 「トラップ」Nature 
"Trap", Wild Spell ● Ancient Trap ● Blessyou Trap ● Blossom Trap ● Celestial Trap ● Chakechake Trap ● Dangerous Trap ● Dondon Trap Now ● Faerie Trap ● Farmer Trap ● Goldenden Trap ● Goriming Trap ● Kyuden Trap ● Leaf Storm Trap ● Naturatrue Trap ● Ochame Trap ● Paradise Roar Five Sense Trap ● Purification Trap ● Rafflesia Trap ● Spike Trap ● The Strong Trap ● Torch Buster Trap ● Trap x Trap ● TulkTulk Trap ● Vine TrapMulticolored
Dragon Fantasy Trap Spark ● Miraculous Truce ● Trap Charger ● 「Destructive Red! Scrapper Red!」「Knowledgeable Blue! Brain Blue!」「Enchanting Green! Trap Green!」「Flashy Yellow! Spark Yellow!」「Greedy Purple! Hand Purple!」「We are where the break is! Shield Sentai, Triggerger!!」Other Civilizations
Bubble Trap ● Drill Trap ● Flame Lance Trap ● Trap Commune ● Virtual TripwireTwinpacts
Alarm Radish / Naturatrue Trap ● Dangerdeon, Super Mechanical Trap / Hell Utopia's Trap Revelation ● Drap, Escalden / Maxcargo Trap ● Fabula Snail / Gorchop Trap ● Hyper Gigatack / Gigatack Hyper Trap ● Kawamoriden / Leaf Storm Trap ● Lemongrass, Analysis Faerie / Grass Trap ● Na Turalgo Danger / Natural Trap ● Ochappi X, Idol Faerie / Choco Trap! ● Tsumricargo La Denden the 3rd / Rolling TrapSupport
Dangerdeon, Super Mechanical Trap / Hell Utopia's Trap Revelation ● Na Turalgo Danger / Natural TrapRelated Cards
Codename Prat ● Terraape, Trap Chain ● Trap Giant ● Traptops, Green Trap Toxickind ● Trap's Rune

Night Master, Shadow of Decay 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Night Master, Shadow of Decay滅びの影ナイト・マスター 
 Japanese (base):
滅びの影ナイト・マスター
 Phonetic:
Horobi no Kage Naito Masutā
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
6
Race:
Ghost
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー（このクリーチャーをタップして、相手クリーチャーの攻撃先をこのクリーチャーに変更してもよい） 
Power:
3000
Flavor Text:
ふりかえるな。見てはいけないものがそこにある。Don't turn around. You wouldn't want to see what's behind you. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Hideaki Takamura
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   59/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  23/110 — Rare Promotional   A5/Y1 — Rare 
Other Card Information:

OCG 
Can Attack Untapped Creatures 
Nomad Hero Gigio 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Nomad Hero Gigio放浪の勇者ジージョ 
 Japanese (base):
放浪の勇者ジージョ
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Machine Eater
English Text:
■ This creature can attack untapped creatures.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーは、タップされていないクリーチャーを攻撃できる。 
Power:
3000
Flavor Text:
さあ旅に出よう。新しい世界には、一体どんなゴミがあるんだろう! 」 "Time to move on. So many unexplored worlds, so much trash to find!" ─Nomad Hero Gigio (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Eiji Kaneda
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   83/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  31/110 — Rare DMC-01 Shobu's Blaze Deck   10/43 — Rare 
Other Card Information:

in:

and

TCG

Come Into Play Trigger 
Self Mana Burn 
Onslaughter Triceps 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Onslaughter Triceps強襲兵ギガントス (Assault Soldier Gigantos) 
 Japanese (base):
強襲兵ギガントス (Assault Soldier Gigantos)
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Dragonoid
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put 1 card from your mana zone into your graveyard.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーをバトルゾーンに出した時、カードを1枚、自分のマナゾーンから墓地に置く。 
Power:
5000
Flavor Text:
最も早く前線に出る者が、最も早く敵を倒すことができる。The first to the front lines are the first to taste victory. (DM-01, DMC-18, DMC-06)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Katsuya
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   84/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  63/110 — Uncommon DM-18 Best Challenger   79/140 — Uncommon DMC-06 Dragon Strikes Deck   32/82 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Pangaea's Song 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Pangaea's Songガイアズ・ソング 
 Japanese (base):
ガイアズ・ソング
 Phonetic:
Gaiazu Songu
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
1
English Text:
■ Put 1 of your creatures from the battle zone into your mana zone.
Japanese Text:
■ バトルゾーンにある自分のクリーチャーを1体、自分のマナゾーンに置く。 
Flavor Texts:
"Here’s something better for you to do." —Fighter Dual Fang (DM-01) 戦士たちよ、小さき者の呼び声に答えよ! "Warrior, answer the call of the little ones!" (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Seki  Ippei Soeda
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   100/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  70/110 — Uncommon DM-18 Best Challenger   90/140 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

in:
Blocker, Water, Creature,

5 more
Mana Cost 3 
Gel Fish 
4000 Power Creatures 
TCG 
OCG 
Phantom Fish 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Phantom Fishファントム・フィッシュ 
 Japanese (base):
ファントム・フィッシュ
 Phonetic:
Fantomu Fisshu
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Gel Fish
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
■ This creature can't attack.
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー（このクリーチャーをタップして、相手クリーチャーの攻撃先をこのクリーチャーに変更してもよい）
■ このクリーチャーは攻撃することができない 
Power:
4000
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Ittoku
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   36/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  79/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   103/140 — Common Promotional   B3/7 Y1 — Common 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Poisonous Dahlia 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Poisonous Dahlia毒吐きダリア 
 Japanese (base):
毒吐きダリア
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Tree Folk
English Text:
■ This creature can't attack players.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーは、相手プレイヤーを攻撃できない。 
Power:
5000
Flavor Text:
「あなたを誰にも渡さない」――毒吐きダリアの花言葉 "I will never give you up." -Symbolic meaning of the poisonous dahlia in flower language (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Hideaki Takamura
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   101/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  65/110 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:

Balloon Mushroom

TCG 
OCG 
Mana Acceleration 
Come Into Play Trigger 
Poisonous Mushroom 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Poisonous Mushroomシビレアシダケ 
 Japanese (base):
シビレアシダケ
 Phonetic:
Shibireashidake
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
2
Race:
Balloon Mushroom
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put 1 card from your hand into your mana zone.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーをバトルゾーンに出した時、自分の手札を1枚、マナゾーンに置いてもよい。 
Power:
1000
Flavor Texts:
You won't find these mushrooms on salads. (DM-01) 永遠に尽きることのない生命の泉。大地から生まれ、木々と共に死ぬ。掟は命を無駄に使わぬこと、それが自然文明。A fountain of life that never ends. Born from the earth, it dies with the trees. To not utilize life in vain, that is the law of the Nature Civilization. (P40/Y4) ジョーカーズ星もレインボーの力に溢れた結果、新たにチーム切札の本拠地となったのだ! "As a result of the Joker's star being filled with the power of the rainbow, it has now become the new headquarters of Team Kirifuda!" (DMEX-09)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Daisuke Izuka  Syuichi Obata
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   102/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  69/110 — Uncommon DM-18 Best Challenger   88/140 — Uncommon DMEX-09 W-Team Docking Pack: Team Kirifuda & Team Wave   22/42 — Uncommon Promotional   P40/Y4 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

in:
Light, Creature, Mana Cost 6, 			
and
6 more
Berserker 
3000 Power Creatures 
TCG 
OCG 
Deck Search 
Come Into Play Trigger 
Rayla, Truth Enforcer 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Rayla, Truth Enforcer真理の伝道師レイーラ 
 Japanese (base):
真理の伝道師レイーラ
 Phonetic:
Shinri no Dendōshi Reīra (Rayla, Preacher of Truth)
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
6
Race:
Berserker
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a spell from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーをバトルゾーンに出した時、自分の山札を見る。その中から呪文を1枚選んで相手に見せ、自分の手札に加えてもよい。その後、山札をシャッフルする。 
Power:
3000
Flavor Text:
伝道師たちは予言者の言葉を伝え、言葉は真理の力を持つだろう。  The Enforcers deliver the oracles' words, which bear the power of truth. (DM-01, DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Dai
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   15/110 — Very Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  2/110 — Very Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   3/140 — Very Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
			Categories			 
Categories: 
Light
Creature
Mana Cost 6
Berserker
3000 Power Creatures
TCG
OCG
Deck Search

Red-Eye Scorpion 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Red-Eye Scorpionレッドアイ・スコーピオン 
 Japanese (base):
レッドアイ・スコーピオン
 Phonetic:
Reddoai Sukōpion
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Giant Insect
English Text:
■ When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーがバトルゾーンから自分の墓地に置かれるとき、墓地に置くかわりに自分のマナゾーンに置く。 
Power:
4000
Flavor Text:
森の奥で火を燃やしてはいけない。怒りで目を真っ赤に染めたサソリたちが襲ってくるから。Never start a fire in the depths of the forest. Enraged red-eye scorpions will come after you. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Kou1
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   103/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  37/110 — Rare 
Other Card Information:

OCG 
Reusol, the Oracle 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
This is a Vanilla card.It has no abilities.
Reusol, the Oracle予言者リュゾル 
 Japanese (base):
予言者リュゾル
 Phonetic:
Yogensha Ryuzoru
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
2
Race:
Light Bringer
Power:
2000
Flavor Texts:
Soul and light enmeshed in a web of glory. (DM-01) 天空に輝く塔は、たちを守るためだけに存在する。 The shining towers in the sky exist to protect the oracles. (DM-01, DMC-05, DMC-10, DMC-26)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Soushi Hirose
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   16/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  75/110 — Common DMC-26 Hakuoh's Angel Kingdom Deck   33/45 — Common 
Other Card Information:

Revolver Fish 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Revolver Fishリボルバー・フィッシュ 
 Japanese (base):
リボルバー・フィッシュ
 Phonetic:
Riborubā Fisshu
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Gel Fish
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
■ This creature can't attack.
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー（このクリーチャーをタップして、相手クリーチャーの攻撃先をこのクリーチャーに変更してもよい）
■ このクリーチャーは攻撃することができない。 
Power:
5000
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Naoki Saito
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   37/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  48/110 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:

Roaring Great-Horn 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Roaring Great-Horn咆哮するグレート・ホーン 
 Japanese (base):
咆哮するグレート・ホーン
 Phonetic:
Hōkō Suru Gurēto Hōn
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
7
Race:
Horned Beast
English Text:
■ Power attacker +2000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)
​■ Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
Japanese Text:
■ パワーアタッカー+2000（攻撃中、このクリーチャーのパワーは+2000される）
​■ W・ブレイカー(このクリーチャーはシールドを2つブレイクする) 
Power:
8000+
Flavor Text:
大地をゆるがす咆哮とともに、獣たちの王が立ち上がった。With a mighty, earthshaking roar, the King of Beasts arose. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Ittoku
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   S10/S10 — Super Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  S9/S10 — Super Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
  W ● ERoaring Great-HornCreatures
Grelphy, Sutured Evil Horn ● Roaring Great-Horn ● Roaring Grind Horn

Come Into Play Trigger 
Rothus, the Traveler 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Rothus, the Traveler銃神兵ディオライオス (Dio Raios, Divine Gun Soldier) 
 Japanese (base):
銃神兵ディオライオス (Dio Raios, Divine Gun Soldier)
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Armorloid
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーをバトルゾーンに出した時、自分のクリーチャーを1体破壊する。その後、相手は自分自身のクリーチャーを1体選び、破壊する。 
Power:
4000
Flavor Texts:
"Though battered and scarred, I march on through wars, storms, and strife. I march on." (DM-01, M14/Y1) "I have been to ten thousand dimensions, yet still I search for home." (DMS-01) 何度でも、何度でも戦う。古きことは恥ではない。I will fight again and again, no matter how many times. The old ways are not shameful. (DMC-23) ディオライオスとディオジープは、アウトレイジたちのドロン・ゴーとシールド・ゴー、ふたつの力をサポートした。Dio Raios and Dio Jeep supported the two forces, Doron Go and Shield Go, of the Outrage faction. (DMD-11)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Seki  Shishizaru
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   85/110 — Rare Duel Masters Starter Deck  85a/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  32/110 — Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   41/140 — Rare DMC-01 Shobu's Blaze Deck   11/43 — Rare DMC-05 Lightning Thunder Deck   15/82 — Rare DMC-14 Crimson Armorloids Deck   11/78 — Rare DMC-23 Speed Burn Half Deck   7/43 — Rare DMC-61 CoroCoro Dream Pack 4: Eternal Heaven   26/94 — Rare DMD-11 Forbidden Transform Deck: The Book of Outrage   c15/21 — Rare Promotional   M14/Y1 — No RarityPromotional   A1/Y1, P7/Y1, 85a/110 — Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Armorloid

in:
Blocker, Light, Creature, 			
and
6 more
Mana Cost 3 
Starlight Tree 
3000 Power Creatures 
TCG 
OCG 
Creature Untap 
Ruby Grass 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Ruby Grass紅玉草 
 Japanese (base):
紅玉草
 Phonetic:
Rubī Gurasu (Ruby Grass)
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Starlight Tree
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
■ This creature can't attack players.
■ At the end of each of your turns, you may untap this creature.
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー（このクリーチャーをタップして、相手クリーチャーの攻撃先をこのクリーチャーに変更してもよい）
■ このクリーチャーは、相手プレイヤーを攻撃できない。
■ 自分のターンの終わりに、このクリーチャーをアンタップしてもよい。 
Power:
3000
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Naoki Saito  Iron Pot
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   17/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  44/110 — Uncommon DM-18 Best Challenger   55/140 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:

in:

Gel Fish

Power Based Removal 
Self Bounce 
Come Into Play Trigger 
Saucer-Head Shark 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Saucer-Head Sharkソーサーヘッド・シャーク 
 Japanese (base):
ソーサーヘッド・シャーク
 Phonetic:
Sōsāheddo Shāku
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Gel Fish
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return all creatures in the battle zone that have power 2000 or less to its owner's hand.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーをバトルゾーンに出した時、バトルゾーンにあるパワー2000以下のクリーチャーをすべて、持ち主の手札に戻す。 
Power:
3000
Flavor Texts:
"Isn't it cool? The heads can be combined." —Tropico 「かっこいいだろう。あたまががったいするんだぜ。」 "Isn't it cool? It'll make your head spin!" —Tropico  (DM-01) 「やっぱ、とうぶにどっきんぐするのはおとこのろまんだよな! 」 "After all, the true romance for a man is going for a headlong rush!" —Tropico (DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Naoki Saito  Takesi Kuno
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   38/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  18/110 — Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   28/140 — Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Creature
Mana Cost 5
Gel Fish
3000 Power Creatures
TCG
OCG
Bounce
Mass Removal
Power Based Removal
Self Bounce
Come Into Play Trigger

Scarlet Skyterrorクリムゾン・ワイバーン 
 Japanese (base):
クリムゾン・ワイバーン
 Phonetic:
Kurimuzon Waibān (Crimson Wyvern)
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
8
Race:
Armored Wyvern
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures that have "blocker".
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーがバトルゾーンに出たとき、バトルゾーンにある「ブロッカー」を持つクリーチャーをすべて、持ち主の墓地に置く。 
Power:
3000
Flavor Text:
The forces of Fire will never relent. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Tomofumi Ogasawara
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   S8/S10 — Super Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  S7/S10 — Super Rare

Seamine 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Seamineシーマイン 
 Japanese (base):
シーマイン
 Phonetic:
Shīmain
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
6
Race:
Fish
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー（このクリーチャーをタップして、相手クリーチャーの攻撃先をこのクリーチャーに変更してもよい） 
Power:
4000
Flavor Text:
美しい物を見ながら死にたいのならば、水中都市に攻めこめばいい。 If the last thing you want to see in your life is something beautiful, attack an underwater city. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Tomofumi Ogasawara
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   39/110 — Very Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  4/110 — Very Rare 
Other Card Information:

in:
Blocker, Light, Creature, 			
and
5 more
Mana Cost 3 
Starlight Tree 
4000 Power Creatures 
TCG 
OCG 
Senatine Jade Tree 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Senatine Jade Tree翡翠樹 
 Japanese (base):
翡翠樹
 Phonetic:
Jeido Tsurī (Jade Tree)
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Starlight Tree
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
■ This creature can't attack players.
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー（このクリーチャーをタップして、相手クリーチャーの攻撃先をこのクリーチャーに変更してもよい）
■ このクリーチャーは、相手プレイヤーを攻撃できない。 
Power:
4000
Flavor Text:
天空をただよう木々は、汚れた空気から美しい光を作り出す。Floating trees in the sky generate beautiful light from poisoned air. (DM-01, DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Norikatsu Miyoshi  Ken Sugawara
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   18/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  71/110 — Common 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
			Categories			 
Categories: 
Blocker
Light
Creature
Mana Cost 3
Starlight Tree
4000 Power Creatures
TCG
OCG

OCG 
Skeleton Soldier, the Defiled 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
This is a Vanilla card.It has no abilities.
Skeleton Soldier, the Defiled汚れた者スケルトンソルジャー 
 Japanese (base):
汚れた者スケルトンソルジャー
 Phonetic:
Kegareta Mono Sukerutonsorujā
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Living Dead
Power:
3000
Flavor Text:
"Rip. Tear. Gnash. They all make the same delightful noises." (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Katsuya
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   60/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  87/110 — Common DMC-02 Kokujo's Darkness Deck   21/43 — Common

Random Page
in:
Shield Trigger, Light, Spell, 			
and
4 more
Mana Cost 2 
TCG 
OCG 
Creature Tapper 
Solar Ray 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Solar Rayソーラー・レイ 
 Japanese (base):
ソーラー・レイ
 Phonetic:
Sōrā Rei
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
2
English Text:
​​ Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.)
■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.
Japanese Text:
​ S・トリガー (この呪文をシールドゾーンから手札に加える時、コストを支払わずにすぐ唱えてもよい)
■ バトルゾーンにある相手のクリーチャーを1体選び、タップする。 
Flavor Texts:
"You're lucky I only used a star. Next time I'll send a supernova your way." —Elixia, Pureblade Elemental (DM-10) 体が動かぬとも出来る事はある。お奨めは最後の懺悔だ。There are things you can do while you're immobile. A suggestion would be to make your final repentance. (DM-10, DMC-16) まばゆい閃光が視界を埋め尽くす! "A blinding flash of light covers the field of vision!" (DM-32)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Jason  Asai Genji  Kazuo Matsushima
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   19/110 — Common Shadowclash Collector Tin  14/46 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  78/110 — Common DM-10 Shockwaves of the Shattered Rainbow   25/110 — Common DM-10 Eternal Arms   78/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   100/140 — Common DMC-16 Guardian Blue Deck   50/78 — Common DM-32 Evolution Saga   77/110 — Common 
Other Card Information:

TCG 
OCG 
Gives "Unblockable" 
Sonic Wing 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Sonic Wingソニック・ウイング 
 Japanese (base):
ソニック・ウイング
 Phonetic:
Sonikku Uingu
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
3
English Text:
■ Choose one of your creatures in the battle zone. It can't be blocked this turn.
Japanese Text:
■ バトルゾーンにある自分のクリーチャーを1体選ぶ。 このターン、そのクリーチャーはブロックされない。 
Flavor Text:
"Can't catch me!" (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Masaki Hirooka
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   20/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  77/110 — Common Promotional   A4/Y1 — Common 
Other Card Information:

in:
Shield Trigger, Water, Spell, 			
and
5 more
Mana Cost 2 
TCG 
OCG 
Bounce 
Self Bounce 
Spiral Gate 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Spiral Gateスパイラル・ゲート 
 Japanese (base):
スパイラル・ゲート
 Phonetic:
Supairaru Gēto
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
2
English Text:
​​ Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.)
■ Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.
Japanese Text:
​ S・トリガー (この呪文をシールドゾーンから手札に加える時、コストを支払わずにすぐ唱えてもよい)
■ クリーチャーを1体選び、持ち主の手札に戻す。 
Flavor Texts:
そこだ! "There!" (DM-06, DMC-08, DMS-02) "Come back when you can handle it." —Zaltan (DM-10) こっちの水は辛いぜ。ママのミルクで我慢しな。 The water here's harsh. Go back to your mama's milk. (DM-10, DMC-16, DMC-17, DMS-03) 逆境も跳ね返せ! "Coming back from an adversity!" (DMD-02) 渦巻く門が開く。時が巻き戻るが、戻って来ないものもある。The spiral gate opens. Even if time can be reversed, there are some things that cannot come back. (DMX-10) 邪魔するやつらは片っ端から排除する! それがアウトレイジのやり方。"Anyone who gets in the way will be eliminated! That’s the way of the Outrage." (DMD-09) 時間よ、戻れ! "Time, go back!" (DMD-17) 邪魔者をたった2マナで追い返せるっちゃ! さすが殿堂カードだっちゃ! "With just 2 mana, I can send the nuisance packing! Truly a Hall of Fame card!" (DMX-20) 時の流れは大体巻き戻せない。だから、巻き戻せる時は遠慮なく。The flow of time cannot be reversed most of the time. That is why we make the most out of it when it does. (DMD-24) 水文明が席巻せし時、その超次元への対抗策は封じられた。When the Water Civilization ruled, the countermeasures against the Hyperspatial were sealed. (DMX-21) 機知が生み出す荒渦は、なにものも寄せ付けない。The whirlpool created by wit lets nothing approach. (DMEX-08) 3、2、1! Goシュート!! "3, 2, 1! Go Shoot!!" (P57/Y15)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Tomofumi Ogasawara  Eiji Kaneda  青木たかお
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   40/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  86/110 — Common DM-06 Stomp-A-Trons of Invincible Wrath   47/110 — Common DM-06 Invincible Soul   86/110 — Common DM-10 Shockwaves of the Shattered Rainbow   40/110 — Common DM-10 Eternal Arms   85/110 — Common DMC-08 Endless Black Hole Deck   54/82 — Common DMC-16 Guardian Blue Deck   54/78 — Common DMC-17 Dark Warriors Deck   54/78 — Common DMD-02 Start Dash Deck: Water & Darkness   11/15 — Common DMX-10 Deck Builder Oni DX Bright Star! Leo Edition  47/56 — Common DMD-09 1st Deck Outrage Dash   13/14 — Common DMD-17 Beginning Dragon Deck: Crystal Memory Dragon   14/14 — Common DMX-20 Deck Ultimate Perfection!! Due-Max 160 ~Revolution & Invasion~   58/68 — Common DMD-24 Masters Chronicle Deck: Bolmeteus Returns   34/37 — Common DMX-21 Masters Chronicle Pack: Comic of Heroes   70/70 — No RarityDMEX-08 Mysterious Black Box Pack  257/??? — Common Promotional   P57/Y15 — Common 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
  W ● ESpiralCreatures
Cyber W Spiral ● Fatal Spiral, Infinite Dragon ● Irony Spiral, Blue Divine Dragon ● Kubrick, Spiral AcceleratorEvolution Creatures
Spiral Moon, the EnlightenedSpells
Cloned Spiral ● Duet Spiral ● Energy Spiral ● Evolution Burst - Energy Spiral ● Naruto Spiral ● Rainbow Spiral ● Revolution Spiral ● Riptide Charger (Spiral Charger) ● Robby Spiral Moonsault ● Scrapper Spiral Spark ● Screw Spiral ● Shadowflash Revival Spiral ● Spiral a.k.a. Tornado ● Spiral Drive ● Spicy Spiral ● Spiral Formation ● Spiral Gate ● Spiral Hurricane, Hero Secret Technique ● Spiral Lance ● Spiral Slider ● Spray Spiral ● Stored Magic Spiral ● Summer's Day Spiral ● Surf Spiral ● Synchro Spiral ● The Strong Spiral ● Vilvi Spiral, Ultra Sen MysteryCross Gear
Spiral AuraOrega Aura
*/ Spiral, Nigen /*

Nature, Creature, Mana Cost 5, 			
and
5 more
Horned Beast 
4000 Power Creatures 
TCG 
OCG 
Unblockable 
Stampeding Longhorn 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Stampeding Longhorn暴走するロング・ホーン 
 Japanese (base):
暴走するロング・ホーン
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Horned Beast
English Text:
■ This creature can't be blocked by any creature that has power 3000 or less.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーは、パワー3000以下のクリーチャーにブロックされない。 
Power:
4000
Flavor Text:
暴走するロング・ホーンが通り過ぎると、土ぼこりだけしか残らない。A stampeding longhorn leaves nothing but dust in its wake. (DM-01, DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Norikatsu Miyoshi
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   104/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  38/110 — Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   46/140 — Rare Promotional   T1 Y1, P4/Y0 — Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Horned Beast

OCG

Nature, Creature, Mana Cost 2,

Beast Folk 
3000 Power Creatures 
TCG 
OCG 
Steel Smasher 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Steel Smasher鋼鉄の鎚 (Hammer of Steel) 
 Japanese (kana):
アイアン・ハンマー (Iron Hammer)
 Japanese (base):
鋼鉄の鎚 (Hammer of Steel)
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
2
Race:
Beast Folk
English Text:
■ This creature can't attack players.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーは、相手プレイヤーを攻撃できない。 
Power:
3000
Flavor Text:
おれ、でかい。おれ、強い。おれ、殴る。 "Me big. Me tough. Me smash." ─Iron Hammer, Boar Warrior  (DM-01, DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Katsuya
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   105/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  107/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   137/140 — Common 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Nature
Creature
Mana Cost 2
Beast Folk
3000 Power Creatures
TCG
OCG

Random Page
in:
Darkness, Creature, Mana Cost 3, 			
and
6 more
Parasite Worm 
5000 Power Creatures 
TCG 
OCG 
Self Removal 
Come Into Play Trigger 
Stinger Worm 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Stinger Worm凶食虫スティンガーワーム 
 Japanese (base):
凶食虫スティンガーワーム
 Phonetic:
Kiyoushokuchuu Sutingāwāmu (Stinger Worm, Gluttony Bug)
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
3
Race:
Parasite Worm
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーをバトルゾーンに出した時、自分のクリーチャーを1体破壊する。 
Power:
5000
Flavor Text:
ワームは死体をあやつって、次の死体を作り出す。When worms kill a creature, they can still make it move. (DM-01, DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Norikatsu Miyoshi
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   61/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  57/110 — Uncommon DM-18 Best Challenger   71/140 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
			Categories

Darkness
Creature
Mana Cost 3
Parasite Worm
5000 Power Creatures
TCG
OCG
Self Removal
Come Into Play Trigger

Stonesaur 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Stonesaurストーンザウルス 
 Japanese (base):
ストーンザウルス
 Phonetic:
Sutōnzaurusu (Stonesaurus)
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Rock Beast
English Text:
■ Power attacker +2000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)
Japanese Text:
■ パワーアタッカー+2000（攻撃中、このクリーチャーのパワーは+2000される） 
Power:
4000+
Flavor Text:
火の領域に安全な場所はない。何もない岩場が最も恐ろしい場所だから。 There is no sanctuary in the Fire Territory. Especially on the featureless, rocky plains. (DM-01, DMC-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Miho Midorikawa
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   86/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  59/110 — Uncommon DMC-01 Shobu's Blaze Deck   17/43 — Uncommon

Colony Beetle

Come Into Play Trigger 
Storm Shell 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Storm Shellシェル・ストーム 
 Japanese (base):
シェル・ストーム
 Phonetic:
Sheru Stōmu (Shell Storm)
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
7
Race:
Colony Beetle
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses one of his creatures in the battle zone and puts it into his mana zone.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーがバトルゾーンに出たとき、相手はバトルゾーンから自分自身のクリーチャーを1体選び、持ち主のマナゾーンに置く。 
Power:
2000
Flavor Text:
コロニー・ビートルの産卵は悪夢である。弾丸のような卵が、豪雨のように降り注ぐ。 A Colony Beetle's spawning is a virtual nightmare. It covers the earth with a hail of its bullet-like eggs.(DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Sansyu
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   106/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  35/110 — Rare 
Other Card Information:

Super Explosive Volcanodon 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Super Explosive Volcanodon超砲手ボルカノドン (Ultra Gunner Volcanodon) 
 Japanese (base):
超砲手ボルカノドン (Ultra Gunner Volcanodon)
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Dragonoid
English Text:
■ Power attacker +4000 (While attacking, this creature gets +4000 power.)
Japanese Text:
■ パワーアタッカー+4000（攻撃中、このクリーチャーのパワーは+4000される） 
Power:
2000+
Flavor Texts:
After it attacks, the lucky are left with rubble. (DM-01) 城壁すらも意味がない。一撃で何も残らない。Even the castle walls are meaningless. With one strike, nothing remains. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Naoki Saito
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   87/110 — Uncommon Shadowclash Collector Tin  38/46 —DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  62/110 — Uncommon DM-18 Best Challenger   78/140 — Common Promotional   M13/Y1, P1/Y1 — No Rarity
Other Card Information:

in:
Darkness, Creature, Mana Cost 7, 			
and
6 more
Parasite Worm 
2000 Power Creatures 
TCG 
OCG 
Choice Removal 
Come Into Play Trigger 
Swamp Worm 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Swamp Worm腐食虫スワンプワーム 
 Japanese (base):
腐食虫スワンプワーム
 Phonetic:
Fushiyokuchuu Suwanpu Wāmu (Swamp Worm, Corrosive Bug) 
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
7
Race:
Parasite Worm
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーをバトルゾーンに出した時、相手は自分自身のクリーチャーを1体選び、破壊する。 
Power:
2000
Flavor Text:
Flesh is its food. Bones are its toothpicks. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Youichi Kai  Taro Yamazaki
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   62/110 — Uncommon Shadowclash Collector Tin  31/46 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  53/110 — Uncommon DM-18 Best Challenger   68/140 — Uncommon DMC-22 Hell Boost Half Deck   15/43 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Parasite Worm

OCG 
Szubs Kin, Twilight Guardian 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Szubs Kin, Twilight Guardian黄昏の守護者シーブス・キーン 
 Japanese (base):
黄昏の守護者シーブス・キーン
 Phonetic:
Tasogare no Shugosha Shībusu Kīn
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Guardian
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
■ This creature can't attack players.
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー(相手クリーチャーが攻撃する時、このクリーチャーをタップして、その攻撃を阻止してもよい。その後、その相手クリーチャーとバトルする)
■ このクリーチャーは、相手プレイヤーを攻撃できない。 
Power:
6000
Flavor Text:
天空の塔の住人たちは、侵入者をけして許さなかった。Those who dwell in the sky towers eradicate all intruders. (DM-01, DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Ittoku
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   21/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  11/110 — Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   17/140 — Rare Promotional   P3/Y0 — Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Creature

Guardian
6000 Power Creatures

											History										
											Talk (0)										
Teleportationテレポーテーション 
 Japanese (base):
テレポーテーション
 Phonetic:
Terepōtēshon
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
5
English Text:
■ Choose up to 2 creatures in the battle zone and return them to their owners' hands.
Japanese Text:
■  バトルゾーンにあるクリーチャーを2体まで選び、持ち主の手札に戻す。 
Flavor Texts:
生まれる前からやりなおしたら? "Start all over from your previous life!" —Crystal Lancer (DM-01) 昨日きやがれ! "Come back yesterday!" (DM-18, DMS-05) その遅れ、命取り! "That delay will be fatal!" (DMC-24)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Akifumi Yamamoto  Dustmoss
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   41/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  21/110 — Rare DMC-24 Illusion Blue Half Deck   4/43 — Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   29/140 — Rare 
Other Card Information:

in:

Fixed Removal 
Hand 
Terror Pit 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
This card is included in the Hand name category.
Terror Pitデーモン・ハンド  demon hand 
 Japanese (base):
デーモン・ハンド  demon hand
 Phonetic:
Dēmon Hando (Demon Hand)
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
6
English Text:
​​ Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.)
■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.
Japanese Text:
​ S・トリガー (この呪文をシールドゾーンから手札に加える時、コストを支払わずにすぐ唱えてもよい)
■ 相手のクリーチャーを1体破壊する。 
Flavor Texts:
誰もその手からは逃れられない。闇の力とはそれほどに強力なものなのだ。-悪魔神デスモナーク No one escapes the hand. It is a powerful thing of darkness —Death Monarch, Lord of Demons (DMC-28) 漆黒の闇から現れたその腕は、命と共に希望をも刈り取っていく。 The arm that emerges from the darkness is jet black and reaps both hope and life. (DMC-35, DMPCD-01) 虚空から伸びる黒き手は、全てを闇へと誘う邪神の腕に他ならない。The black hand reaching from the void is nothing but the arm of a malevolent god, leading everything into darkness. (DMC-36) 相手にとっては悪魔の手でも、自分にとっては神の手だ。To the opponent, it may be the hand of a demon, but to oneself, it is the hand of God. (DMC-38) てめーには、最高の恐怖をくれてやるぜ! "I'll give you the greatest fear imaginable!" ─Kyoshiro Kokujo (DMC-48) 死神の気まぐれは、最高にして最悪のタイミングに訪れる。The whims of the Grim Reaper arrive at the best and worst timing. (DMC-55, DMC-61, DMC-65, DMX-03) 闇より伸びる魔獣の手、その手からは何人たりとも逃れることはできない。 The demonic beast's hand extending from the darkness; no one can escape from it. (DMC-60) 古より恐れられた、最強の黒き手。The strongest black hand, feared since ancient times. (DMC-63) 古から恐れられている、悪魔の手。The Demon Hand, feared since ancient times. (DMD-02) オマエにとっては悪魔の手、オレにとっては逆転の女神。 For you, it's the hand of the devil; for me, it's the goddess of comeback. (DMD-04) 勝利のためであれば、ときに鬼の力も借りよ。If you want to win, sometimes borrow the power of demons. (DMD-05) 悪もまた力。Evil is also power. (DMX-09) ボクと滅びの誓いを交わすかい? Will you swear an oath of destruction with me? (DMD-08) 悪魔の力を借りるか、神の力を借りるか、それだけの違いだ。It's just a matter of borrowing the power of the devil or borrowing the power of God. (DMD-10) 悪魔の力も神の手の内に。The power of the devil is also within the hands of God. (DMD-12) 教団崩壊後も、イズモは力を蓄えつつ、裏からオラクルとブリティッシュ一派を操っていたのだった。After the collapse of the cult, Izumo continued to accumulate power and secretly manipulated the Oracle and the British faction from behind the scenes.  (DMD-14) 悪魔の手が差し伸べられる。　---ファンキー・ナイトメアのことわざで「ラッキー」の意味 The Hand of the Devil can be reached out! -Lucky sayings of the Funky. (DMD-19) いつでも逆転をもたらす悪魔の手。その真の姿が明らかに...？ This is the Demon hand that Reverses. Will its true form be known...? (DMD-22) 逆転のキッカケは、いつでもトリガーだ! デッキに8枚以上いれて、逆転チャンスを作れ! The key to reversal is always a trigger! Put 8 or more Shield Triggers in your deck for a chance to reverse tough situations! (DMX-20) S・トリガーで悪魔の手を借りれば、相手の切り札も一撃だ!  To borrow the Devil's Hand in a shield trigger, this is how you destroy the opponent's trump card! (DMD-31) 真に恐ろしいのは、悪魔すら支配する存在。 Truly frightening, the presence dominates even the devil. (DMD-33) シールド・トリガーで相手の切り札を倒せ! !  デッキに合計８枚以上入れると、グンっと防御力が上がるぞ! Defeat the opponent's trump card with a shield trigger!! If you put more than 8 cards in total on the deck, the defense power will go up gently! (DMSP-01) 攻撃してきた相手をコレで粉砕! S・トリガーはデッキの大事な防御手段だ。Crush the opponent who dares to attack with this! Shield Triggers are crucial defensive measures in the deck. (DMSD-09) 「S・トリガー」は防御の要! うまく攻撃をしのいだら、さあ反撃だ!! "Shield Triggers are crucial for defense! Once you successfully fend off the attack, it's time to counterattack!" (SpDeck8) あらゆる文明の強者たちを利用し、ドラグハートに封印し続けた「忌むべき邪悪」ザ＝デッドマンは、ついに5文明の力を封じ込めた最強のドラグハートを作り出した。その名は、オール・オーバー・ザ・ワールド。　― ドラゴン・サーガファイナルウォーズ その1 The=Deadman, the "Detestable Evil" that continuously sealed the strongest beings of all the civilizations into Draghearts, finally created the strongest Dragheart with the power of the 5 Civilizations. Its name is All Over The World. -Dragon Saga Final Wars, Part 1 (DMBD-14, 21/25) 5文明の力を持ったオール・オーバー・ザ・ワールドに対抗するためには、5文明のドラグナーの力が必要だった。水文明の尽力とグレンモルトの魅力によって、決して交わることの無かった5人のドラグナーが手をとったのだった。　— ドラゴン・サーガ ファイナルウォーズ その2　In order to compete with All Over The World, which had possessed the power of the 5 Civilizations, the powers of the Draguners from across each civilization were needed. Due to the efforts of the Water Civilization, and Glenmalt's charm, the 5 Draguners who had never met, took each other's hand. -Dragon Saga Final Wars, Part 2 (DMBD-14, 22/25) 自らの失敗によりザ＝デッドマンを復活させてしまったサソリスは、大量のドングリが持つ「力を生み出す力」によって、火と光と闇のドラグナーを「最終龍覇」へと目覚めさせた。そして、ピタゴラス艦隊と全ドラグナーによる後方支援を受け、3人の「最終龍覇」はオール・オーバー・ザ・ワールドを撃破したのだった。　― ドラゴン・サーガファイナルウォーズ その3 Sasoris, whose blunder caused The=Deadman to awaken, awakened the Draguners of Fire, Light, and Darkness to "Final Draguners".  Then, with logistical support from the Pythagoras Squadron, and all the Draguners, the 3 "Final Dragon Rulers" defeated All Over The World. -Dragon Saga Final Wars, Part 3 (DMBD-14, 23/25) オール・オーバー・ザ・ワールドを撃破するのに力を使い果たした5文明の前に現れたのは、消えたはずのザ=デッドマンだった。対抗する力を持たない各文明のドラグナーをドラグハートに封印しようとするザ=デッドマン。しかし、5文明の友情の力が、グレンモルトを最終の次の力、モルトNEXTへと目覚めさせた。　— ドラゴン・サーガ ファイナルウォーズ その4 It was The=Deadman, who should had disappeared, that appeared before the 5 civilizations that had ran out of power in order to defeat All Over The World. The=Deadman tries to seal the Draguners of each civilization, who no longer had the power to resist, into Draghearts. However, the 5 Civilization's power of friendship awakened Glenmalt to the final next power, MaltNEXT. (DMBD-14, 24/25) 悪魔も恐れる神の復讐。The vengeance of God that even demons fear. (P86/Y12) 今、貴殿の目の前にあるのが、死の理そのものなのだよ。What is before your eyes right now is the very essence of death.（P23/Y14） S・トリガーは逆転の必殺技だ! ブレイクされたシールドがコレだったら大チャンス! 相手の攻撃できるクリーチャーを破壊しよう! "Shield Triggers are the ultimate technique for a comeback! If the broken shield turns out to be this, it's a huge opportunity! Let's destroy the creature that can attack the opponent!" (Gum2) 呪文はつかいおわったら墓地におくのだ! "When you're done using a spell, put it into your graveyard!" (SpDeck9)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Yusaku Nakaaki  Hisashi Momose  Akifumi Yamamoto  Toshiaki Takayama  hippo  Nariann  Mikio Masuda  Shigenobu Matsumoto
Sets and Rarity:

Scrapper Red!」「Knowledgeable Blue! Brain Blue!」「Enchanting Green! Trap Green!」「Flashy Yellow! Spark Yellow!」「Greedy Purple! Hand Purple!」「We are where the break is! Shield Sentai, Triggerger!!」Twinpacts
Cove Sidia / Lighthand Lightning ● Denka, Misfortune Demon 92 / End of Century Hand ● Final Forbidden Redtron, D2V3 / Forbidden Hand ● Luginus, Dragon Armored Doctor / God Hand of Hell ● Mad Demon Excellency / Demon Hand ● Magi, Mechanic / 「Power of Hand Des」 ● Quakes, Fiendish General of Cursed Bones / Quakes Hand ● Team Usagi, Rare Card Hunter / Rabbit Hand ● Trombo, Fractured Doll / Devil HandSupport

Death Hands, Misfortune Emperor

Come Into Play Trigger 
Thorny Mandra 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Thorny Mandraトゲ刺しマンドラ 
 Japanese (base):
トゲ刺しマンドラ
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Tree Folk
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put 1 creature from your graveyard into your mana zone.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーがバトルゾーンに出たとき、自分の墓地からクリーチャーを1体選び、自分のマナゾーンに置いてよい。 
Power:
4000
Flavor Text:
美しい花。甘い匂い。毒のトゲ。A beautiful flower, an alluring scent... and deadly thorns. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Atsushi Kawasaki
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   107/110 — Very Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  10/110 — Very Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

in:
Light, Creature, Mana Cost 5,

5 more

TCG 
OCG 
Creature Untap 
Toel, Vizier of Hope 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Toel, Vizier of Hope希望の使徒トール 
 Japanese (base):
希望の使徒トール
 Phonetic:
Kibō no Shito Tōru (Toel, Apostle of Hope)
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Initiate
English Text:
■ At the end of each of your turns, you may untap all your creatures in the battle zone.
Japanese Text:
■ 自分のターンの終わりに、バトルゾーンにある自分のクリーチャーをすべてアンタップしてもよい。 
Power:
2000
Flavor Texts:
希望の使徒よ、覚醒せよ。汝の歌は夜明けの風なり。"Vizier of Hope, arise. Your singing voice is a breeze of dawn." —Hanusa, Radiance Elemental (DM-01, M7/Y1, DMC-26) 希望の使徒よ、我等が敵を圧倒せよ。闇を照らす光の如く。The Apostle of Hope, we will overwhelm the enemy. Like the light that shines through the darkness. (DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Masaki Hirooka  Katsuya
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   22/110 — Uncommon Shadowclash Collector Tin  16/46 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  41/110 — Uncommon DM-18 Best Challenger   52/140 — Uncommon DMC-26 Hakuoh's Angel Kingdom Deck   12/45 — Uncommon Promotional   M7/Y1 — No Rarity
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Creature

Initiate
2000 Power Creatures
TCG
OCG
Creature Untap

in:
Shield Trigger, Fire, Spell, 			
and
4 more
Mana Cost 5 
TCG 
OCG 
Power Based Removal 
Tornado Flame 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Tornado Flameトルネード・フレーム 
 Japanese (base):
トルネード・フレーム
 Phonetic:
Torunēdo Furēmu
Civilization:
Fire 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
5
English Text:
​​ Shield trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost.)
■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.
Japanese Text:
​ S・トリガー (この呪文をシールドゾーンから手札に加える時、コストを支払わずにすぐ唱えてもよい)
■ バトルゾーンにある、パワー4000以下の相手のクリーチャーを1体選び、持ち主の墓地に置く。 
Flavor Text:
な、なんでおいら達がー! "Wh-why are we the ones?!" — Ponpoko, Hole-digging Team (DM-25)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Soushi Hirose  hippo
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   88/110 — Uncommon DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  64/110 — Uncommon DM-25 Violence Creator   27/55 — Uncommon DMC-01 Shobu's Blaze Deck   20/43 — Uncommon DMC-15 Eternal Dragons Deck   32/78 — Uncommon 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Shield Trigger
Fire
Spell
Mana Cost 5
TCG
OCG
Power Based Removal

in:
Nature, Creature, Mana Cost 6, 			
and
5 more
Colony Beetle 
5000 Power Creatures 
TCG 
OCG 
Unblockable 
Tower Shell 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Tower Shellシェル・タワー 
 Japanese (base):
シェル・タワー
 Phonetic:
Sheru Tawā (Shell Tower)
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
6
Race:
Colony Beetle
English Text:
■ This creature can't be blocked by any creature that has power 4000 or less.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーは、パワー4000以下のクリーチャーにブロックされない。 
Power:
5000
Flavor Text:
Not many things want to get in its way. もう止められない。 (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Atsushi Kawasaki
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   108/110 — Very Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  9/110 — Very Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Tri-horn Shepherd 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
This is a Vanilla card.It has no abilities.
Tri-horn Shepherd群れを守るトライ・ホーン 
 Japanese (base):
群れを守るトライ・ホーン
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Horned Beast
Power:
5000
Flavor Text:
Sometimes weeks pass before it realizes it has a gored enemy stuck to its horns. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Daisuke Izuka
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   109/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  36/110 — Rare DM-18 Best Challenger   45/140 — Rare

in:
Water, Creature, Mana Cost 5, 			
and
5 more
Cyber Lord 
3000 Power Creatures 
TCG 
OCG 
Unblockable 
Tropico 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Tropicoトロピコ 
 Japanese (base):
トロピコ
 Phonetic:
Toropiko
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
5
Race:
Cyber Lord
English Text:
■ This creature can't be blocked while you have at least 2 other creatures in the battle zone.
Japanese Text:
■ バトルゾーンに自分のクリーチャーが他に2体以上出ているなら、このクリーチャーはブロックされない。 
Power:
3000
Flavor Texts:
"I will lead you into battle." (DM-01) 「おまえたち、ボクについてこい。」 "You guys, follow me." ―Tropico (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Jason
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   42/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  19/110 — Rare Promotional   P5/Y0 — Rare 
Other Card Information:

Random Page
in:
Nature, Spell, Mana Cost 5, 			
and
3 more
TCG 
OCG 
Mana Acceleration 
Ultimate Force 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Ultimate Forceアルティメット・フォース 
 Japanese (base):
アルティメット・フォース
 Phonetic:
Arutimetto Fōsu
Civilization:
Nature 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
5
English Text:
■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone.
Japanese Text:
■ 自分の山札の上から2枚を自分のマナゾーンに置く。 
Flavor Text:
偉大なる大地よ、我に力を!  "Great Earth, give me your might!" —Fighter Dual Fang (DM-01, DMC-22) 杖を一振りすると、地面に埋めたばかりの種は瞬く間に大樹へと成長した。With a single wave of the staff, the freshly buried seed rapidly grew into a mighty tree. (DM-18)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrators:
Sansyu  Hisashi Momose
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   110/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  109/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   139/140 — Common DMC-22 Hell Boost Half Deck   42/43 — Common 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia

Mana Acceleration

in:
Water, Creature, Mana Cost 4, 			
and
7 more
Fish

TCG 
OCG 
Bounce 
Self Bounce 
Come Into Play Trigger 
Unicorn Fish 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Unicorn Fish一角魚 
 Japanese (base):
一角魚
 Phonetic:
Yunikōn Fisshu
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
4
Race:
Fish
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose 1 creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーをバトルゾーンに出した時、バトルゾーンにあるクリーチャーを1体選び、持ち主の手札に戻してもよい。 
Power:
1000
Flavor Text:
なわばりを荒らす者をけっして許さず、リヴァイアサンにすら襲いかかる。 It attacks anything that enters its territory, even Leviathans. (DM-01, DMX-03)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Hisanobu Kometani
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   43/110 — Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  20/110 — Rare DMC-08 Endless Black Hole Deck   6/82 — Rare DMX-03 Deck Builder DX: Alien Edition   6/42 — Rare 
Other Card Information:

in:
Double Breaker, Light, Creature, 			
and
6 more
Mana Cost 6 
Angel Command 
6000 Power Creatures 
TCG 
OCG 
Creature Untap 
Urth, Purifying Elemental 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Urth, Purifying Elemental浄化の精霊ウルス 
 Japanese (base):
浄化の精霊ウルス
 Phonetic:
Jōka no Seirei Urusu (Urth, Spirit of Purification)
Civilization:
Light 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
6
Race:
Angel Command
English Text:
​■ Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
■ At the end of each of your turns, you may untap this creature.
Japanese Text:
​■ W・ブレイカー(このクリーチャーはシールドを2つブレイクする)
■ 自分のターンの終わりに、このクリーチャーをアンタップしてもよい。 
Power:
6000
Flavor Texts:
It is said the destruction of the Ancient Empire was caused by the descent of the elementals. (DM-01) 太古帝国が滅びた原因は、精霊が地上に降りてきたためだと言われている。It is said that the reason why the ancient empire was ruined is that the spirits came down to earth. (DM-01) 触れることすら敵わない圧倒的な輝き! これぞ光の切札なり!! There is no other such overwhelming glow! This is the emblem of light! (DMC-54) 完全なるものを目指した戦士達の、記念すべき第一歩。初めて、その姿を描いた時の緊張が今も蘇る! A memorable first step for warriors who are aiming for perfection. The tension from when the figure first appeared is still alive and well! (P18/Y7)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Akifumi Yamamoto
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   S2/S10 — Super Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  S2/S10 — Super Rare DMC-54 Legend Chronicle Rival  5/20 — Super Rare Promotional   P18/Y7 — Super Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
  W ● EUrthCreatures
Ur, Cleansing Elemental ● Urgaan, Connected Pure Dark ● Urth, Purifying ElementalTwinpact
Urth, Purifying Elemental / Holy Spirit Spark
			Categories			 
Categories: 
Double Breaker
Light
Creature
Mana Cost 6
Angel Command
6000 Power Creatures
TCG
OCG
Creature Untap

Vampire Silphy 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Vampire Silphy妖姫シルフィ 
 Japanese (base):
妖姫シルフィ
 Phonetic:
Yōki Shirufi (Silphy, Demon Princess)
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
8
Race:
Dark Lord
English Text:
■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures that have power 3000 or less.
Japanese Text:
■ このクリーチャーがバトルゾーンに出たとき、各プレイヤーはバトルゾーンにあるパワー3000以下のクリーチャーすべてを、それぞれの墓地に置く。 
Power:
4000
Flavor Text:
ダークロードは弱者を許さない。Dark Lords have no mercy for the weak. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Masaki Hirooka
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   64/110 — Very Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  5/110 — Very Rare Shadowclash Collector Tin  2/46 — Very Rare 
Other Card Information:

OCG 
Creature Tapper 
Trap 
Virtual Tripwire 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
This card is included in the Trap name category.
Virtual Tripwireエレメンタル・トラップ 
 Japanese (base):
エレメンタル・トラップ
 Phonetic:
Erementaru Torappu (Elemental Trap)
Civilization:
Water 
Card Type:
Spell
Mana Cost:
3
English Text:
■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.
Japanese Text:
■ バトルゾーンにある相手のクリーチャーを1体選び、タップする。 
Flavor Text:
おねがい、じっとしててね。……死ぬまで It will stay until it dies. (DM-01)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Akifumi Yamamoto
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   44/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  85/110 — Common 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
  W ● ETrap 「トラップ」Nature 
"Trap", Wild Spell ● Ancient Trap ● Blessyou Trap ● Blossom Trap ● Celestial Trap ● Chakechake Trap ● Dangerous Trap ● Dondon Trap Now ● Faerie Trap ● Farmer Trap ● Goldenden Trap ● Goriming Trap ● Kyuden Trap ● Leaf Storm Trap ● Natural Snare ● Naturatrue Trap ● Ochame Trap ● Paradise Roar Five Sense Trap ● Purification Trap ● Rafflesia Trap ● Spike Trap ● The Strong Trap ● Torch Buster Trap ● Trap x Trap ● TulkTulk Trap ● Vine TrapMulticolored
Dragon Fantasy Trap Spark ● Miraculous Truce ● Trap Charger ● 「Destructive Red! Scrapper Red!」「Knowledgeable Blue! Brain Blue!」「Enchanting Green! Trap Green!」「Flashy Yellow! Spark Yellow!」「Greedy Purple! Hand Purple!」「We are where the break is! Shield Sentai, Triggerger!!」Other Civilizations
Bubble Trap ● Drill Trap ● Flame Lance Trap ● Trap CommuneTwinpacts
Alarm Radish / Naturatrue Trap ● Dangerdeon, Super Mechanical Trap / Hell Utopia's Trap Revelation ● Drap, Escalden / Maxcargo Trap ● Fabula Snail / Gorchop Trap ● Hyper Gigatack / Gigatack Hyper Trap ● Kawamoriden / Leaf Storm Trap ● Lemongrass, Analysis Faerie / Grass Trap ● Na Turalgo Danger / Natural Trap ● Ochappi X, Idol Faerie / Choco Trap! ● Tsumricargo La Denden the 3rd / Rolling TrapSupport
Dangerdeon, Super Mechanical Trap / Hell Utopia's Trap Revelation ● Na Turalgo Danger / Natural TrapRelated Cards
Codename Prat ● Terraape, Trap Chain ● Trap Giant ● Traptops, Green Trap Toxickind ● Trap's Rune

2000 Power Creatures 
TCG 
OCG 
Wandering Braineater 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Wandering Braineaterさまよう者ブレイン・イーター 
 Japanese (base):
さまよう者ブレイン・イーター
 Phonetic:
Samayō Mono Burein Ītā
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
2
Race:
Living Dead
English Text:
​​ Blocker (When an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the two creatures battle.)
■ This creature can't attack.
Japanese Text:
​​ ブロッカー(相手クリーチャーが攻撃する時、このクリーチャーをタップして、その攻撃を阻止してもよい。その後、その相手クリーチャーとバトルする)
■ このクリーチャーは攻撃することができない。 
Power:
2000
Flavor Texts:
Devouring nice, fresh brains is all they know... and all they care about. (DM-01) 彼らは血をすすり、肉をむさぼり喰うことだけを知っている。They only know how to sip blood and devour flesh. (DM-01, DM-18, DMC-02)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Youichi Kai
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   65/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  91/110 — Common DM-18 Best Challenger   116/140 — Common DMC-02 Kokujo's Darkness Deck   27/43 — Common 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
			Categories			 
Categories: 
Blocker
Darkness
Creature
Mana Cost 2
Living Dead
2000 Power Creatures
TCG
OCG

Writhing Bone Ghoul 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
This is a Vanilla card.It has no abilities.
Writhing Bone Ghoulうごめく者ボーン・グール 
 Japanese (base):
うごめく者ボーン・グール
 Phonetic:
Ugomeku Mono Bōn Gūru
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
2
Race:
Living Dead
Power:
2000
Flavor Texts:
Seeking power, they gave up their intelligence. What they found was pain. (DM-01) 彼らは知性を捨て、永遠の命を求めた。そして、永遠の苦しみを受け取った。They abandoned their intellect in the pursuit of eternal life. What they found was eternal suffering. (DM-01, DMC-02)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Eiji Kaneda
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   66/110 — Common DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  90/110 — Common DMC-02 Kokujo's Darkness Deck   26/43 — Common 
Other Card Information:

Zagaan, Knight of Darkness 
						View source					
											History										
											Talk (0)										
Zagaan, Knight of Darkness暗黒の騎士ザガーン 
 Japanese (base):
暗黒の騎士ザガーン
 Phonetic:
Ankoku no Kishi Zagān
Civilization:
Darkness 
Card Type:
Creature
Mana Cost:
6
Race:
Demon Command
English Text:
​■ Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)
Japanese Text:
​■ W・ブレイカー(このクリーチャーはシールドを2つブレイクする) 
Power:
7000
Flavor Texts:
"If I were to send him to the field, he'd overwhelm the enemy in an instant. Where's the fun in that?" —Ballom, Master of Death (DM-01) 「つまらん。やつを戦場に出したら、一方的に勝つに決まっている。」"How boring. When he enters the battlefield, the battlefield pretty much becomes one-sided to us." —Tyrant Black Monarch (DM-01) つまらんやつを戦場に出したら、戦場がどうなるか知っているのか? "Do you know what happens to the battlefield when you send a boring guy into it?" ―Devil Diabolos Double Zeta, Ultimate Awakened (DMX-12)
Mana Number:
1
Illustrator:
Tsutomu Kawade
Sets and Rarity:
 DM-01 Base Set   S6/S10 — Super Rare DM-01 Base Set (OCG)  S6/S10 — Super Rare DMX-12 Black Box Pack   b40/??? — Super Rare 
Other Card Information:
Gallery ● Rulings ● Tips ● Trivia
  W ● EZagaanCreatures
Gazaan, Ancient Knight ● Sunzan, Labyrinth Knight ● Urgaan, Connected Pure Dark ● Zagaan, Knight of Darkness ● Zagaan GR, Knight of Darkness ● Zagaan, Knight of Demon's BirthTwinpacts
Zagaan, Knight of Darkness / 「"I'll make this a one sided battle."」
			Categories
